customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the appearance, ease of assembly, and value for money of the table. they mention its cute, fits perfectly with the simple modern theme, and is great for the price. some also like the quality and functionality. however, some are disappointed with scratch resistance. opinions are mixed on the sturdiness and size. ai generated from the text of customer reviews select to learn more appearance ease of assembly value for money table quality functionality sturdiness customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the size, ease of assembly, and comfort of the sofa. they mention its perfect for a small space, comfortable seats two regular sized people, and is super easy to put legs on. some appreciate the color and value for money. however, some customers disagree on its sturdiness. ai generated from the lamps encounter the modern furnitures, bringing unique charm to your space. dim light the light like stars accompanies you in the dark night. soft light feel the warmth of home in the soft light. bright light bright light drives away every dark corner and illuminate a space. next page a thoughtful functional design dimmer knob dimmer knob lamps have advantages that cannot be replaced by touch control lamps. wider dimming range while the touch lamp only has 3 brightness levels can dim the light while touch lamp can only turn them up, which is harsh in the dark more stable performance while touch lamp may flicker randomly more usage scenarios while touch lamp only has 3 brightness levels with tiny differences, it can not be meet both the brightness needs of sleeping and reading. seeded glass lampshade seeded bubble glass shade has more characteristics than ordinary clear glass. this timeless design will give your space a whole new look. and the 2.5mm thick lampshade can isolate a large part of the heat generated by the long term power on of the bulb. 3 in 1 table top lamp with usb c usb ports 2 prong ac outlet you will have three charging ports with 5v 2.1a output. 1 type c, 1 usb a and 1 ac outlet allow you to charge most electronic devices. you can use them to charge even when the bedroom nightstand lamps are turned off. long cable standard us plug the 59 cable is long enough to reach a corner power outlet. please note whether the us plug can be used in your country and region before purchase. anti skid pad the anti skid pad helps it not move easily on smooth surfaces, low noise. and the relevant parts are ul listed, you can use it with confidence. 6w t45 led bulbs the brightness is equivalent to 60w incandescent bulb. no flicker, can minimize the damage to eyes. the lifespan can be as long as 25,000hrs. whats in the package the black lamps set of 2 are the excellent choice if you are looking for a gift on special days like birthday, festivals, star 2 star 1 star 3 star 76 13 5 2 3 5 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 2 star 76 13 5 2 3 2 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 1 star 76 13 5 2 3 3 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the looks, brightness, and usb ports of the lamp. they mention it provides nice ambiance, has a dimmer people found this helpful helpful report marian 5.0 out of 5 stars attractive, useful lamps reviewed in the united states on june 25, 2024 color seeded clear verified purchase were using these attractive lamps as our bedside table lamps. they work extremely well in that capacity. each lamp has a fairly heavy base, so it wont fall over or slide around on a table a problem we had with a previous small lamp. the dimmer switch which also turns on the lamp goes from very low light to very bright, making the lamp useful for anything from just ambience to whatever you need bright light for. however, these are led bulbs, so their yellow light isnt really yellow. i dislike the whitish light so im replacing the bulbs. the electrical outlet on the top of the base is a plus, and also product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how quick and easy shelving and they were a great price. they definitely work well to hold what i need and seem sturdy enough, and were fairly easy to assemble. however, one of them had some misalignment issues. no matter how hard i tried on it, i could not get the back paneling to line up it just was not square. also, a couple of the shelves didnt align either. none of it was bad enough to attempt a return they were cheap and i didnt expect perfection. ive owned many of these particleboard type pieces of furniture and they were a expected. i move every 2 3 years and dont expect to keep them much try again later. david bantz 5.0 out of 5 stars good small light duty bookcase easy to assemble reviewed in the united states on july 30, 2024 color steam beech size 3 tier verified purchase simple, light weight shelves, easily assembled. extra kudos for the simple small but effective nail holder that keeps the nail upright, away from your fingers, and positioned exactly right distance from the edge you nail the very thin back onto the shelves. in the photo of two, i added simple vertical support to avoid what would otherwise be sagging shelves they are just friction fit. to be clear, these are not fine furniture just vinyl over thin particle board, but good value for what they are. read more david bantz 5.0 out of 5 stars good small light duty bookcase easy to assemble reviewed in the united states on july 30, 2024 simple, light weight shelves, easily assembled. extra kudos for the simple small but effective nail holder that keeps the nail upright, away from your fingers, and positioned exactly right distance from the edge you nail the very thin back onto the shelves. in the photo of two, i added simple vertical support to avoid what would otherwise be sagging shelves they are just friction fit. to be clear, these are not fine furniture just vinyl over thin particle board, but good value for what they are. images in this review 6 people found this helpful helpful report tloman 5.0 out of 5 stars fine for the price reviewed in the united states on april 12, 2024 color columbia walnut size 3 tier verified purchase i purchased two of these for my home officegame room. they were very affordable, and the color is nice. additionally, they were easy to put together for the most part. that being said, they do seem a bit flimsy the instruction manual itself says that each shelf can only hold 15lbs so i would not want to use this for books or anything heavy. additionally, as can be expected at this price, theyre particle board, and several of the pieces dont line up particularly well. also, one of the bottom pieces labeled b didnt have the holes marking where to attach the part that goes along the ground in the front part c, and in the other package, one of the little plastic feet didnt have a nail in it. overall, for the price and what i got them for, these are fine. i wouldnt put them in a living room or somewhere like that, nor would i put anything heavy like books on them, but for a home office, bedroom, or game room, these could be a decent option. read more 15 people found this helpful helpful report deborah w 4.0 out of 5 stars good enough reviewed in the united states on july 27, 2024 color plain white size 3 tier verified purchase i ordered these bookshelves with specific measurements in mind. in that regard they are perfect, fitting into the space just as i expected, so i give it 5 stars there. they were easy enough to assemble, but since the shelves are not adjustable, but attached to the sides, assembly took a bit longer than some other shelves i have assembled. since i did not have any issues with understanding how to assemble and i received all the necessary parts , i give the assembly process 5 stars as well. the shelves are sturdy enough for my purposes, but if you want to pack it full of heavy books, they may not hold up well in the long term. i recommend taking into account the weight limits given in the description. based on the description, and my experience so far, i give it 5 stars there, too. where i took a star off my overall review is with the sturdiness of the very top of the bookcase. my husband was looking fir a specific book and when he stood up he steadied himself with the corner of the top shelf. it did not completely damage it, but i did need to glue a couple blocks of wood to reinforce the connection where the shelf is attached to the sides. for extra measure, i did the same with the inside shelves as well. if they would include some type of reinforcement fir added sturdiness, this would have elevated my overall review to 5 stars. all in all, i do recommend these shelves, and would purchase again. read more 4 people found this helpful helpful report kami joy 5.0 other had some major issues. reviewed in the united states on august 13, 2024 color french oak grey size 4 tier verified purchase i really love the french gray oak shade of this bookcase and chose it specifically for that reason and it didnt disappoint i believe the directions said two people were best for assembly but i did it myself using my couch to prop up pieces. if i could improve anything, though, it would be to have adjustable shelves. as is, the shelves are too short for many of my books. still, its a really nice piece and im glad to have it however... i also ordered a three shelf version in amber pine. it was also beautiful but i noticed problems as soon as i started to assemble it. the screws just turned and turned and turned. it was like the pre drilled holes were just too big. nonetheless, i hoped for the best. but when i turned the shelf to screw in the other side, the screws broke through the wood as pictured. some duct tape and longer screws from my own collection later... i got it assembled. i didnt want to return it because i love the look of the wood grain... plus at that point id spent well over an hour working on it. i think for the money it really should type foam, metal, fabric features specs is foldable no special features durable product description modern style and made for you comfort go hand in hand with the aidan sling accent chair. equally at home in a reading nook as it is in your office or family living area, this metal framed chair delivers the sleek, contemporary look youre after with its bold, square frame and relaxed sling profile. textured woven fabric wraps around shredded foam cushions designed with softness that molds to your shape, giving you the perfect customized seat. roomy enough even for taller sitters, the aidan features deep seating you can really sink into for hours at a time. and youll relax fully knowing that its frame is built to support up to 250 lbs. assembling this sling chair is no sweat, since we ship everything youll need in one easy to carry box. available in several versatile colors to match your modern vibe, the aidan sling chair creates the contemporary, comfy ambience youre looking for customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the comfort, ease of assembly, and style of the chair. they mention its very comfortable, great for slouching, and the instructions on the pillows are true. some also say its large enough for them to lay down and fall asleep. customers are also happy with the value for money and quality. however, some dislike the screw holes. ai generated from the text of customer reviews select to learn more comfort ease of assembly style size sturdiness value for money quality reviews with images see all photos previous page next page all photos amazon customer 5 out of 5 stars super fast shipping first thing.. i ordered this on the 19th evening and received it on the 21st before 400pm. thats super fast shipping this color was labeled as dark grey. i bought it bc it was the cheapest one and i can get more pillow covers 25x30 each btw made to go with my warm colors in my boho farmhouse style if it was too cold but the color in natural daylight is more of a dark denim which im very happy with its not as dark as the listing picture. in my photos i paired with a light cream, a yellow, a blackwhite checkered blanket and a neutral camelbeige pillow to hopefully get the camera to see what the closest i could get to actual color. as far as build i was done in about 25mins bc i have experience with all the orders from amazon. i did have to flip a piece over which meant i had to lay it on its side to shimmy one out in order to get it together correctly. i can see how it could take someone a while to do if you dont have any experience. all parts were labeled correctly and no parts leftover. if i were to buy another chair i would assemble each arm square first then the three support bars, fabric sling then other square all while its on its side. i allowed pillows 48hrs to fluff periodically manually fluffing to hurry the process before putting on the cases and the base has adjustable feet if its not level. nice, sturdy, big chair build in the room its going in or youll have to unscrew the 3 bars that support the seat. also thank you to the couple who help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews number of drawers 5 style vintage about this item multi scene applicationthis dresser is designed in a modern concise style, which is attractive and functional, making it suitable for any room. it can be a storage dresser in the bedroom or a side table in the living room, also great for closets, nurseries, entryways, hallways, offices, playrooms, childrens room and more. double display shelfspecially designed with the double layer shelf. the wooden top is solid and wear resistant. it can display vases, photo frames, lamps, decorations, etc. or it can be used to place glasses, alarm clocks, books, chargers and other sundries, which is not only convenient and practical but also artistic as a decor. durable storage drawerfeatures foldable storage drawers. each fabric drawer not wood offers large storage space, perfect for organizing clothes, toys, socks, underwear, scarves, blankets and other accessories. the drawers are made of pvc fabric, lightweight and durable, and wont pinch hands, also safe for child to use. sturdy structurethe chest of drawer is made with sturdy metal frame, and its back is equiped with more reinforced x type crossbar, which offers high strength support and ensure years of use. it weighs only 17 pounds, isnt bulky and easy to move. anti toppling device is provided to prevent it from falling down. fully guaranteed stability and safety. easy to assemblethe package includes all the tools and accessories, you can install it in 20 minutes with the instruction. the wood dresser is slim and light, and does not take up much space. perfect gift for a housewarming or your family and friends. overall dimension 11.5d x16.1w x 43.3h see more product details report an issue with this product or seller frequently bought together this item furnulem customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the ease of assembly, looks, and functionality of the dresser. they mention its visually appealing, makes their front room look organized, and the drawer surface has a nice wood like appearance. some are also satisfied with the storage space. however, some customers differ on the sturdiness, size, value for money, and drawer material. ai generated from the text of customer reviews select to learn more ease of assembly sturdiness looks functionality storage space room, dorm, office, etc. adds style to your place even with light off previous page stepless dimming allows the light to be turned up and down in a wide brightness range. modern style the cool metal lamps encounter the modern furnitures, bringing unique charm to your space. dim light the light like stars accompanies you in the dark night. soft light feel the warmth of home in the soft light. bright light bright light drives away every dark corner and illuminate a space. next page a thoughtful functional design dimmer knob dimmer knob lamps have advantages that cannot be replaced by touch control lamps. wider dimming range while the touch lamp only has 3 brightness levels can dim the light while touch lamp can only turn them up, which is harsh in the dark more stable performance while touch lamp may flicker randomly more usage scenarios while touch lamp only has 3 brightness levels with tiny differences, it can not be meet both the brightness needs of sleeping and reading. seeded glass lampshade seeded bubble glass shade has more characteristics than ordinary clear glass. this timeless design will give your space a whole new look. and the 2.5mm thick lampshade can isolate a large part of the heat generated by the long term power on of the bulb. 3 in 1 table top lamp with usb c usb ports 2 prong ac outlet you will have three charging ports with 5v 2.1a output. 1 type c, 1 usb a and 1 ac outlet allow you to charge most electronic devices. you can use them to charge even when the bedroom nightstand lamps are turned off. long cable standard us plug the 59 cable is long enough to reach a corner power outlet. please note whether the us plug can be used in your country and region before purchase. anti skid pad the anti skid pad helps it not move easily on smooth surfaces, low noise. and the relevant parts are ul listed, you can use it with confidence. 6w t45 led bulbs the brightness is equivalent to 60w incandescent bulb. no flicker, can minimize the damage to eyes. the lifespan can be as long as 25,000hrs. whats in the package the black lamps set of 2 are the excellent choice if you are looking for a gift on special days like birthday, festivals, star 2 star 1 star 3 star 76 13 5 2 3 5 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 2 star 76 13 5 2 3 2 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 1 star 76 13 5 2 3 3 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the looks, brightness, and usb ports of the lamp. they mention it provides nice ambiance, has a dimmer attractive lamps as our bedside table lamps. they work extremely well in that capacity. each lamp has a fairly heavy base, so it wont fall over or slide around on a table a problem we had with a previous small lamp. the dimmer switch which also turns on the lamp goes from very low light to very bright, making the lamp useful for anything from just ambience to whatever you need bright light for. however, these are led bulbs, so their yellow light isnt really yellow. i dislike the whitish light so im replacing the bulbs. the electrical outlet on the top of the base is a plus, and also room type living room, bedroom, home office, nursery, hallway special feature sturdy material alloy steel finish type rustic number of drawers 5 style vintage about this item multi scene applicationthis dresser is designed in a modern concise style, which is attractive and functional, making it suitable for any room. it can be a storage dresser in the bedroom or a side table in the living room, also great for closets, nurseries, entryways, hallways, offices, playrooms, childrens room and more. double display shelfspecially designed with the double layer shelf. the wooden top is solid and wear resistant. it can display vases, photo frames, lamps, decorations, etc. or it can be used to place glasses, alarm clocks, books, chargers and other sundries, which is not only convenient and practical but also artistic as a decor. durable storage drawerfeatures foldable storage drawers. each fabric drawer not wood offers large storage space, perfect for organizing clothes, toys, socks, underwear, scarves, blankets and other accessories. the drawers are made of pvc fabric, lightweight and durable, and wont pinch hands, also safe for child to use. sturdy structurethe chest of drawer is made with sturdy metal frame, and its back is equiped with more reinforced x type crossbar, which offers high strength support and ensure years of use. it weighs only 17 pounds, isnt bulky and easy to move. anti toppling device is provided to prevent it from falling down. fully guaranteed stability and safety. easy to assemblethe package includes all the tools and accessories, you can install it in 20 minutes with the instruction. the wood dresser is slim and light, and does not take up much space. perfect gift for a housewarming or your family and friends. reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the ease of assembly, looks, and functionality of the dresser. they mention its visually appealing, makes their front room look organized, and the drawer surface has a nice wood like appearance. some are also satisfied with the storage space. however, some customers differ on the sturdiness, size, value for money, and drawer material. ai generated from the text of customer reviews select to learn more ease of assembly sturdiness looks functionality storage space size value for extra space you can use it for slippers. stackablethe bamboo shelf has a very practical splicing feature, each main pole has grooves at both ends and is connected by bamboo tips, when you have of 5 stars images in this review reviews with images see all photos previous page next page all photos amazon customer 5 out of 5 stars a very lightweight show rack we have a lot of shoes, and need lots of shoe racks. we have used the same type of shoe rack for years, so we thought we would try out this zl house 4 tier stackable shoe rack for our closet.all the parts were there, and everything fit together well. our only complaint is that is it somewhat flimsy. it is made from bamboo, which is what we wanted, but since it does not have a stabilizing bar in the center, the shelves sag in the middle if you put any weight on it at all. plus, shoe boxes, or larger size shoes, will stick out the front by an inch or two. i attached a picture to show this.so.if you are only going to put smaller, flatter walking shoes without boxes on this rack you are all good. if you have bigger shoes, golf shoes, or high top sneakers you might not want this. but for the money, this is a nice shoe rack.recommended. more hide thank you for your feedback close sorry, there was an error close sorry we couldnt load the review try again sort reviews by top reviews most recent top reviews top reviews 2024 verified purchase we have a lot of shoes, and need lots of shoe racks. we have used the same type of shoe rack for years, so we thought we would try out this zl house 4 tier stackable shoe rack for our closet. all the parts were there, and everything fit together well. our only complaint is that is it somewhat flimsy. it is made from bamboo, which is what we wanted, but since it does not have a stabilizing bar in the center, the shelves sag in the middle if you put any weight on it at all. plus, shoe boxes, or larger size shoes, will stick out the front by an inch or two. i attached a picture to show this. so.if you are only going to put smaller, flatter walking shoes without boxes on this rack you are all good. if you have bigger shoes, golf shoes, or high top sneakers you might not want this. but for the money, this is a nice shoe rack. recommended. read more island gal 5.0 out of 5 stars a very lightweight show rack reviewed in the united states on september 8, 2024 we have a lot of shoes, and need lots of shoe racks. we have used the same type of shoe rack for years, so we thought we would try out this zl house 4 tier stackable shoe rack for our closet. all the parts were there, and everything fit together well. our only complaint is that is it somewhat flimsy. it is made from bamboo, which is what we wanted, but since it does not have a stabilizing bar in the center, the shelves sag in the middle if you put any weight on it at all. plus, shoe boxes, or larger size shoes, will stick out the front by an inch or two. i attached a picture to show this. so.if you are only going to put smaller, flatter walking shoes without boxes on this rack you are all good. if you have bigger shoes, golf shoes, or high top sneakers you might not want this. but for the money, this is a nice shoe rack. recommended. images in this review helpful report catherine 5.0 out of 5 stars maximize your space zl house 3 tier bamboo shoe rack a stylish versatile organizer reviewed in the united states on march 26, 2024 color 3 tier verified purchase i purchased the zl house 3 tier shoe rack for my entryway, and it has completely transformed my space management and organization. this shoe rack, highlighted as amazons choice, not only met but exceeded my expectations with its functionality and aesthetic appeal. first off, the assembly of this bamboo shoe rack was straightforward and took minimal time, a relief for someone whos not particularly handy. the instructions were clear, and all necessary components fit together seamlessly. once assembled, the rack felt sturdy and stable, a testament to its quality construction. the bamboo material is not only sustainable and eco friendly but also adds a warm, natural touch to my home decor. its design is sleek and minimalist, making it a versatile addition that blends well with various interior styles, from modern to rustic. functionality wise, the zl house 3 tier shoe rack shines with its capacity and versatility. it comfortably holds up to 9 pairs of shoes, from sneakers to high heels, keeping them organized and easily accessible. the open design ensures that shoes air out properly, which is particularly beneficial in preventing odor buildup in the entryway or closet. one of the standout features of this shoe rack is its stackability. the design allows for easy stacking of another unit on top, offering a customizable solution that grows with your needs. this flexibility to expand is perfect for anyone who loves shoes and needs more space in the future. moreover, the multifunctional aspect of this rack cannot be overstated. beyond shoes, it serves as a handy shelf for storing various items such as bags, boxes, or even plants, making it a multi purpose addition to any room. in conclusion, the zl house 3 tier bamboo shoe rack is a must have for anyone looking to enhance their shoe storage solution. it offers an excellent balance of style, durability, and versatility, making it a valuable investment for keeping your entryway, closet, or hallway clutter free and organized. highly recommended for its practicality and chic design. read more 5 people found this helpful 3 3 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the sturdiness, ease of assembly, and height of the desk. they mention its well built, easy to move, and the perfect desk for their needs. customers are also happy with the size, value for money, and adjustment ability. ai generated from the text of customer with images see all photos previous page next page all photos amazon customer 5 out of 5 stars nice portable standing desk i will start by saying that i do have a large electricmotorized standing desk at my home office which i enjoy and you really cant beat the convenience of adjusting automatically. however, i went on vacation and had to do some school work so i was looking for something affordable. i found this gem and purchased it with really no expectations. i was pleasantly surprised at its stability. i am very tall and at the highest height works well for standing and it fit my needs. the manual adjustment takes some getting used to but i figured that out. the weight of the box was not that heavy and it was easy to put together in under 20 mins. appearance wise, the table top is sleek and has ample width for me to be able to fit my laptop and my portable monitor with room for a few books. i drove so of course i decided to take this home with me and it will be coming with me for future road trips. i recently had emergency surgery and of course this is helping me during my recovery to keep up with my work as you can see from the picture. im glad i purchased this. if you arent able to splurge on a motorized desk, this is awesome and i am glad i now have the convenience of changing my work space and not confined to my basement all day lol more hide thank you for positives color of the desktop desktop has a good amount of space, but small enough to easily tuck the table in a corner assembly was fairly straightforward, i figured it out if you wanted to use it with a walking pad, it feels sturdy and probably wide enough negatives sorry yall i figured assembly out but the instructions could have been more clear. it was a lot of tiny diagrams and arrows. height is adjusted by removinginserting two very long screw in knobs. youll be screwingunscrewing until the end of time there are two other shorter knobs facing outward from the front of the desk. i have no idea what these are for they do not help with height adjustment. i thought that i had used the incorrect knobs but the shorter knobs dont fit in the holes on the side of the desk. for when youre in a seated position there is a bar connecting the legs together underneath the table. i am unable to sit completely underneath it with the desk touching my torso without bumping my legs on the bar. im not a tall person 53 160.02 cm. to be fair, the product description gave measurementsphotos and its intended to be more of a standing desk anyway. if youre looking for a desk that easily 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 2 star 66 14 8 4 8 4 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 1 star 66 14 8 4 8 8 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the quality and ease of installation of the mirror. they mention it looks solid, is easy to put on the wall, and has stayed well for the past few months. customers are also happy with the looks and value for money. however, some customers have reported that the image is distorted and the glass is damaged. opinions differ on the adhesive strength and photos previous page next page all photos amazon customer 4 out of 5 stars great quality mirrors for home gym setup i purchased the delma wall mirror full length set for exercising in my basement. i wanted to ensure i could watch myself to avoid injuries due to poor posture or positioning. the mirrors seem like good quality with no visible defects, and i was able to line them up straight and even on the wall. however, the directions for installation are pretty vague, and there is definitely not enough glue included, so plan to buy some more i also suggest using a laser level to ensure the pieces line up evenly on your wall before gluing them down. four mirrors at the 16x12 inch size dont provide a nice full body view, so i had to purchase two sets. overall, they are a good addition to my home gym. more hide thank you for your feedback close sorry, there was an error close sorry we couldnt load the review try again sort reviews by top reviews most recent top reviews top reviews from elsewhere. great product packaged great images in this review helpful report katherine mick 5.0 out of 5 stars nice mirror tiles reviewed in the united states on june 18, 2024 size 14x12 4pcs verified purchase i bought this for my eleven year old daughters room for the back of the door. was difficult to find those types of mirrors locally. on amazon, full length mirrors were fairly pricey most likely due to the shipping size. i stumbled upon these in my search and after reading the reviews decided they should work well. they do work well. the tiles come well packaged in separate tiles which you can assemble in way you want. i assembled them in a row vertically and the seems are not really a factor in terms of obstructing view or being distracting. the image is good with clear reflection and no odd distorted effects. they all arrived intact and had no damage. these are actual glass tiles not the plastic mirror like material you often see with behind the door mirrors. as a result, i was also concerned with their weight as i didnt want to risk heavy glass panels falling in my daughters room. these are actually fairly thin which worked well for my application. they come with more than enough double sided mounting tape and they hold very well. no concern whatsoever that these will fall. if you are looking for some easily mountable glass panels especially for the back of the door these will work well for you. price was fair and quality seems very good. as for longevity, they are in place firmly and i dont see anyone disturbing them on the back of the door so i anticipate it will last a long time. read more 14 people found this helpful helpful report fuchsia angel 4.0 out of 5 stars great option for a fraction of the price reviewed in the united states on november 6, 2023 size 14x12 16pcs verified purchase i bought two 24 packs of the 12x14 mirror tiles for my home gym project, which gave me an 8 wide x 5 tall mirror. its not perfect pros and cons below, but i still love it and am very satisfied with this purchase pros 1 i love that i was able to build a giant mirror for only about 180 after buying 3m command strips as an alternative installation option. 2 easy and cheap shipping they come in a very small box. 3 easy install with 3m command strips you can remove the tiles and put them back up as many times as needed to get it perfect. 4 modular and scalable you can set them up in any configuration or shape you want and expandadd more later. 5 if you move to a new place, you can take them with you just buy more command strips. 6 the tiles look like real mirrors. 7 speedy delivery. cons 1 distorted image or gaps between tiles. if you put them right up against eachother the cracks distort the image. if you put a small gap between them it looks better but then you have tiny gaps. with the 3m command strips, i was able to do lots of trial and error to get the most seamless mirror possible, but its still not absolutely perfect. 2 the sticky stuff they provide glue and double sided sticky foam will ruin a wall if you need to remove them see other reviews. this is where the 3m command strips come in. i got the small size and cut them in half, putting one in each corner of every tile, and havent had a single issue. these added about 40 to my total project cost, but is well worth it for the ease of installation, removal and moveability. all in all, i would go this route again if i ever have to set up another home gym on a budget. it is a very affordable and easy way to have a huge mirror. you just have to decide if you want small gaps between tiles or a fun house effect along the edges, which still beats spending a thousand dollars on a giant heavy mirror in my opinion. i went with the funhouse option, but it doesnt bother me when i think about how much money i saved. read more fuchsia angel 4.0 out of 5 stars great option for a fraction of the price reviewed in the united states on november 6, 2023 i bought two 24 packs of the 12x14 mirror tiles for my home gym project, which gave me an 8 wide x 5 tall mirror. its not perfect pros and cons below, but i still love it and am very satisfied with this purchase pros 1 i love that i was able to build a giant mirror for only about 180 after buying 3m command strips as an alternative installation option. 2 easy and cheap shipping they come in a very small box. 3 easy install with 3m command strips you can remove the tiles and put them back up as many times as needed to get it perfect. 4 modular and scalable you can set them up in any configuration or shape you want and expandadd more later. 5 if you move to a new place, you can take them with you just buy more command strips. 6 the tiles look like real mirrors. 7 speedy delivery. cons 1 distorted image or gaps between tiles. if you put them right up against eachother the cracks distort the image. if you put a small gap between them it looks better but then you have tiny gaps. with the 3m command strips, i was able to do lots of trial and error to get the most seamless mirror possible, but its still not absolutely perfect. 2 the sticky stuff they provide glue and double sided sticky foam will ruin a wall if you need to remove them see other reviews. this is where the 3m command strips come in. i got the small size and cut them in half, putting one in each corner of every tile, and havent had a single issue. these added about 40 to my total project cost, but is well worth it for the ease of installation, removal and moveability. all in all, i would go this route again if i ever have to set up another home gym on a budget. it is a very affordable and easy way to have a huge mirror. you just have to decide if you want small gaps between tiles or a fun house effect along the edges, which still beats spending a thousand dollars on a giant heavy mirror in my opinion. i went with the funhouse option, but it doesnt bother me when i think about how much money i saved. images in this 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 2 star 70 16 6 3 5 3 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 1 star 70 16 6 3 5 5 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews size queen style modern verified purchase ive put together a lot of furniture over the years. this bed is sturdy the parts were good quality and the instructions easy to follow. it only takes a single included allen wrench to assemble. the wrench could be better to ease assembly but its a one time use and then thrown away. the fit and finish is good. while the headboard isnt grand or plush, it simple and elegant. once completely assembled the bed is sturdy. at first the wood slats seem undersized, but once the mattress is on i couldnt tell. it would take an adult to jump up and down on the mattress to possibly break it. dont plan on putting heavy items in the drawers as they are wire baskets on wheels. they are great for winter clothes, wrapping paper, spare linens etc.. im using this bed in a guest room. it would be great for kidsteen bedrooms and if your on a budget the master bedroom. 5 for sturdiness, style, and assembly. 4 on the drawers. this is a post assembly review, not a grey size king style modern verified purchase i recently upgraded to the allewie upholstered king size platform bed frame with 4 storage drawers and headboard, and it has exceeded all expectations, earning a solid 5 star rating. this bed frame seamlessly blends style with functionality, providing a luxurious sleeping space with added storage convenience. design and construction the upholstered headboard adds a touch of sophistication, creating a focal point in the bedroom. the neutral color complements various decor styles, allowing for easy integration into any room. the quality of the upholstery is evident, providing both comfort and durability. storage drawers the four spacious storage drawers integrated into the bed frame are a game changer for those seeking additional space in the bedroom. these drawers effortlessly slide in and out, offering a discreet and organized solution for storing extra linens, clothing, or personal items. the design ensures that the drawers are seamlessly integrated, maintaining the overall aesthetic appeal of the bed. sturdiness and support the platform design eliminates the need for a box spring, providing excellent support for the mattress. the construction is robust, and the bed frame feels solid and secure. even with the added storage drawers, there is no compromise on stability. easy assembly one notable feature is the straightforward assembly process. the instructions are clear, and all necessary tools are provided. the bed frame came together seamlessly, and i appreciated the attention to detail in the assembly instructions. overall comfort beyond its practical features, the allewie bed frame offers a comfortable and inviting sleeping space. the padded headboard provides a supportive surface for sitting up and reading or watching tv. in conclusion, the allewie upholstered king size platform bed frame has transformed my bedroom into a stylish and organized sanctuary. its a perfect blend of elegance and practicality, and the added storage drawers are a true asset. if youre in search of a high quality, functional, and aesthetically pleasing bed frame, look no further. highly recommended read more 28 certified products whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the indigenous peoples, forest workers and communities yoobure product care instructions wipe with dry cloth size 45h see more material wood mounting type floor mount shelf type tiered shelf shape rectangular about this item modern bookshelf designthe book shelf combines modern design with vintage colors, and it presents a unique personality along with a warm atmosphere that can blend in with most home decor styles. the multifunctional partition design of the book case is perfect for displaying your books, cds, magazines, video games, manga, decorations, novels, speakers and more. save space decor roomyoobure bookshelves dimensions 44.48h15l7.87w. the corner bookcase has 6 storage areas, each storage area can hold 510 books. with its open design and small footprint, this narrow bookshelf is easy to move and organize, making it ideal for corners and small spaces and perfect for use in living rooms, offices and bedrooms. while saving space, this small bookshelf is also a work of art, suitable as a gift for family or friends. sturdy durablethe skinny bookshelf is made of high quality board material, which is not easy to break and has a tough and durable texture. and the tree geometric bookcase is designed with backboard reinforcement, which has strong load bearing capacity. for added safety and stability, we offer anti tip furniture straps that allow you to secure corner bookshelf to the wall, especially for families with children and pets. easy to assemble cleanthe product package includes easy to follow instructions, numbered parts, assembly tools and an installation video on the product page, allowing you to quickly and easily assemble this wood bookshelf. this tall bookshelf has a flat and waterproof surface that can be easily cleaned with a damp rag. we provide 1 year after sales service for this book shelf organizer. if you have any questions and suggestions about our large bookshelf during installation and use, please feel free to contact us, our team will always be there for you. customers usually keep this item this product has fewer returns than average compared to similar products. report an issue with this product or seller make it a bundle we found 5 bundles with this item yoobure range of functional home furnishings that are really affordable for families around the world. what makes our products unique we pour all sincerity to our products. we sell not only goods but reputation, and harvest full trust from customers all these years. why do we love what we do fate makes us get acquainted and trust makes fate endless. we always keep in mind to make people much 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 3 star 75 13 4 3 5 4 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 2 star 75 13 4 3 5 3 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 1 star 75 13 4 3 5 5 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the ease of assembly of the shelf. they mention its simple and easy to put together. they appreciate the sturdiness, appearance, size and capacity. they say itll hold quite a few books without taking up too much floor space. customers are also happy with the quality, and versatility. ai generated from style modern frame material engineered wood material wood fabric maximum weight recommendation 794 pounds about this item wing side design designed with a wing side on the wide upholstered headboard and skin friendly velvet fabric, the queen bed frame can be a must have in any restful retreat. no box spring needed ideal complement not only does our queen bed frame have all the cozy comfort of a foam padded headboard, but it refines your room to the level of a quaint countryside getaway with its symmetrical geometric shape, subtle tone, and graceful wing side design detail soft to touch the velvet fabric and dense foam padding give you a soft and smooth touch, making the queen bed frame with tufted headboard comfortable to lean on and not easy to sag sturdy wood construction interior solid wood framework and robust support feet, 12 pieces of durable wooden slats, and a dense foam padding border increase the comfort and durability of this queen bed frame with wing design. with a maximum weight capacity of 794 lbs reasonable under bed space 6 ground clearance allows vacuum cleaning robots to pass through easily, making cleaning this queen bed frame a breeze for you see more star 2 star 64 13 9 5 10 5 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 1 star 64 13 9 5 10 10 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon 2024 0730am edt photo walmart 1 getty 1 walmart has an impressive roster of celebrity collaborations, including exclusive collections with sofia vergara , drew barrymore , paris hilton , and last but certainly not least, miranda lambert. the country singer turned businesswoman has an entire line of southern inspired home decor and kitchen essentials that will add the perfect dash of charm to your while the stoneware construction ensures even cooking throughout. plus, it has wide handles that make it easy to carry, serve, or take out of the oven. customers raved that its easy to clean and has even gone through the dishwasher without any issues. bronzed pre seasoned cast iron grill pan walmart 25 at walmart once you go pre seasoned cast iron pan, you never go back. this 11 inch design offers superior heat distribution and retention and is perfect for grilling patties, steaks, veggies, chicken, you name it. one skeptical shopper said they werent sure about purchasing the pan, but to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon ...this thing together, i noticed that the parts are flimsy and dont really line up well . the shelves are hinged and dont lay flat when open.... read more view image gallery amazon customer 5.0 out of 5 stars images in this review reviews with images see all photos previous page next page all photos amazon customer 5 out of 5 stars a very lightweight show rack we have a lot of shoes, and need lots of shoe racks. we have used the same type of shoe rack for years, so we thought we would try out this zl house 4 tier stackable shoe rack for our closet.all the parts were there, and everything fit together well. our only complaint is that is it somewhat flimsy. it is made from bamboo, which is what we wanted, but since it does not have a stabilizing bar in the center, the shelves sag in the middle if you put any weight on it at all. plus, shoe boxes, or larger size shoes, will stick out the front by an inch or two. i attached a picture to show this.so.if you are only going to put smaller, flatter walking shoes without boxes on this rack you are all good. if you have bigger shoes, golf shoes, or high top sneakers you might not want this. but for the money, this is a nice shoe rack.recommended. more hide thank you for your feedback close sorry, there was an error close sorry we couldnt load the review try again sort reviews by top reviews most recent top reviews top reviews 2024 verified purchase we have a lot of shoes, and need lots of shoe racks. we have used the same type of shoe rack for years, so we thought we would try out this zl house 4 tier stackable shoe rack for our closet. all the parts were there, and everything fit together well. our only complaint is that is it somewhat flimsy. it is made from bamboo, which is what we wanted, but since it does not have a stabilizing bar in the center, the shelves sag in the middle if you put any weight on it at all. plus, shoe boxes, or larger size shoes, will stick out the front by an inch or two. i attached a picture to show this. so.if you are only going to put smaller, flatter walking shoes without boxes on this rack you are all good. if you have bigger shoes, golf shoes, or high top sneakers you might not want this. but for the money, this is a nice shoe rack. recommended. read more island gal 5.0 out of 5 stars a very lightweight show rack reviewed in the united states on september 8, 2024 we have reviewed in the united states on march 26, 2024 color 3 tier verified purchase i purchased the zl house 3 tier shoe rack for my entryway, and it has completely transformed my space management and organization. this shoe rack, highlighted as amazons choice, not only met but exceeded my expectations with its functionality and aesthetic appeal. first off, the assembly of this bamboo shoe rack was straightforward and took minimal time, a relief for someone whos not particularly handy. the instructions were clear, and all necessary components fit together seamlessly. once assembled, the rack felt sturdy and stable, a testament to its quality construction. the bamboo material is not only sustainable and eco friendly but also adds a warm, natural touch to my home decor. its design is sleek and minimalist, making it a versatile addition that blends well with various interior styles, from modern to rustic. functionality wise, the zl house 3 tier shoe rack shines with its capacity and versatility. it comfortably holds up to 9 pairs of shoes, from sneakers to high heels, keeping them organized and easily accessible. the open design ensures that shoes air out properly, which is particularly beneficial in preventing odor buildup in the entryway or closet. one of the standout features of this shoe rack is its stackability. the design allows for easy stacking of another unit on top, offering a customizable solution that grows with your needs. this flexibility to expand is perfect for anyone who loves shoes and needs more space in the future. moreover, the multifunctional aspect of this rack cannot be overstated. beyond shoes, it serves as a handy shelf for storing various items such as bags, boxes, or even plants, making it a multi purpose addition to any room. in conclusion, the zl house 3 tier bamboo shoe rack is a must have for anyone looking to enhance their shoe storage solution. it offers an excellent balance of style, durability, and versatility, making it a valuable investment for keeping your entryway, closet, or hallway clutter free and organized. highly recommended for its practicality and chic design. read more 5 people found this helpful learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customer 5.0 out of 5 stars images in this review reviews with images see all photos previous page next page all photos amazon customer 4 out of 5 stars dont give up on the gas lifts i love my new bed it was simple to put together, only took me and my boyfriend about 1 12 2 hrs. i gave it only 4 stars simply because of the gas lifts they took forever to mess with and my boyfriend could not, no matter how hard he tried, get the lifts to move we took them off and he pushed down on them with all of his body weight hes 6 tall weighs 210 and still, not one inch he was quickly irritated by the whole thing and gave up on them so i contacted the allewie company who made the bed to try to get new parts.they emailed me back and told us to try it again but this time with the mattress on the bed. if after doing that the lifts still werent working then they would send us new parts.i bought this bed on may 3rd and it was delivered by amazon a few days later. so its been just about three weeks since we assembled the bed together. so today before we tried to mess with it again, i read through the all of the negative reviews on amazon expecting to find a lot of complaints about the lifts but there were 3 there arent that many total that are negative which shocked me one of them said basically the guy had the same issue we were having. he said he tried one week later and suddenly the lifts moved without any issues so.... i held up the bed while my boyfriend put the lifts on but he wasnt going to put the little screws on it until we tried to see if it worked first and sure enough i pushed on it with one hand and it started going down he still didnt believe me so he told me to push it down all the way and then go back up before he did anything else with it. so i tried and i swear that it moves as smooth as butter both up and down with only one hand i am so excited because i love the bed and the only problem i had was not being able to access the storage underneath without my boyfriend holding up the mattresssooo if you are reading this because you are having trouble getting the lifts to work, dont give up wait a bit, a few days or a week or two and try it again... hopefully youll have the same luck as i and that other guy didotherwise its beautiful and i have zero complaints i took pics of my bed down with some of my new stuff on it its a work in progress right now and i love how it looks already i cant wait to see the finished product more hide thank you for your feedback close sorry, there was an error close sorry we couldnt load the review try again sort may 24, 2024 size queen style modern color beige verified purchase living in a somewhat small apartment means that space saving solutions are more than just convenienttheyre essential. thats where the allewie queen size lift up storage bed comes into play, blending functionality with classic style in a way that enhances both the aesthetics and utility of my living space. the standout feature of this bed is undoubtedly its lift up storage mechanism. supported by hydraulics, the bed frame easily lifts to reveal a generous storage area underneath. while the frame is admittedly heavy, the hydraulic system significantly reduces the effort needed to access the storage space. although it requires some force to lift, especially with a heavy mattress, this is a minor trade off for the convenience and extra storage provided. the modern wingback headboard adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to the beds overall design. it not only enhances the beds appearance but also offers sturdy and comfortable support for reading or relaxing in bed. the classic style of the headboard makes this bed a versatile piece that fits seamlessly with various decor styles, making it ideal for anyone looking to upgrade their bedroom aesthetics. durability and stability are key components of this beds design. once raised, the frame feels very sturdy, and theres no fear of it unexpectedly falling or dropping, which gives me peace of mind every time i use the storage feature. in conclusion, the allewie queen size lift up storage bed is a fantastic choice for anyone with limited space who doesnt want to compromise on functionalityspace saving. the added storage is a game changer for small apartments, and the ease of use, coupled with its elegant design, makes this bed a valuable addition to any bedroom. highly recommended for its practicality and streamlined look read more 34 people found this helpful helpful report kelly davis 5.0 out of 5 stars great bed reviewed in the united states on july 3, 2024 size queen style modern color beige verified purchase box arrived very heavy and really beat up, one end was torn open and a rain storm was coming so i had to scoot it into the garage before it rained, then carried the pieces inside. queen size bed looks very nice in the room, surprisingly sturdy. beige color definitely leans more to gray than brown, we currently have beige walls that have more yellow tone in it and the beige bed looks gray against the wall. which is fine we are painting the room anyway. assembly took a couple of evenings after work and does at one point require 2 people to install the springs. at first we put our old innerspring mattress on it and it lifted super easy. then we put the new novaform foam mattress from costco on it and it is noticeably heavier to lift. still doable by an able bodied person but it definitely takes more oomph to lift. love all the storage under we fit a pack n play, extra blankets, pillows and still quite a bit of room. i admit putting things underneath up by the headboard makes me a bit nervous going under there because that mattress is heavy although the bed has given me no reason to think it will collapse, just the thought of it. all in all very pleased with this bed and considering buying a second. read more 10 people found this helpful helpful report hlb 5.0 out of 5 stars great storage can also paint it yourself according to personal preference. size the total height of the bookshelf 50.4 inch 128cm. a total of 4 layers, each layer height 11.6 inch 29.5cm. diameter 17.3 inch 44cm. super large capacity it can hold about 100 medium sized books. talldeep enough to fit trade paperback graphic novels. pretty stable once assembled, it is very stable, and it has been tested that children under the age of 14 cannot push it down. during the entire rotation process of the bookshelf, the bookshelf will not have any shaking. space saving takes up very little space. can be placed in any corner of the room. but it can make every room look like a small library. free assembly mode can be assembled into a 1 layer, 2 layer, 3 layer or 4 layer bookshelf at will. made of pine wood, customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the ease of assembly, storage capacity, and appearance of the product. they mention its easy to put together, has loads of room for books, and is an ideal solution for storing books in small spaces. some also appreciate the spinability and value for money. however, some customers have mixed opinions on the build quality, wood quality, and fit. ai generated from the text of customer reviews select to learn more ease of assembly storage capacity looks good spinability from the united states there was a problem filtering reviews right now. please try again later. ungodwyn 5.0 out of 5 stars this actually works took about 30 min to assemble, handles many sizes of kids books. reviewed in the united states on may 7, 2023 size 4 tier verified purchase this actually works great for most sizes of childrens books, and so far seems pretty sturdy. i was worried it might be a tipping hazard for my toddler before i bought it, but after 1 month of use i am not still concerned. we put heavier books on the bottom and lightweight dvds stuffed animals on the top. if i was really paranoid i might have left off the top shelf, to make it 25 shorter, i think they sell a shorter one, too but so far the 4 shelf version seems to handle daily usage in the nursery just fine. the wood shelves are secured with hex head wood screws , tools and gloves are included, and installation went fine except for one very minor crack while tightening one upper side piece. overall, tolerances and design seem pretty good for an affordable flat packed spinning shelf. my kid likes turning it and picking out books to read at bedtime. this books handles 90 of kids books just fine tall ones, short ones, big ones, small ones however, there is one book shape that it is not good for some kids books like p is for pterodactyl have short heights and really long page widths. approx 8.5 h x11.25w . for these books you probably should use a different shelf, because they will stick out too far and fall off easily unless rotated vertically. but again, this issue affects is less than 10 of our kids books. the good news that it handles even fairly large format books quite well, eg, daullieres book of greek myths fits fine once the shelf is filled. read more 25 people found this product has sustainability features recognized by trusted certifications. forestry practices made with materials from well managed forests, recycled materials, andor other controlled wood sources. as certified by the forest stewardship council the forest stewardship council the forest stewardship council fsc supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. choosing fsc certified products whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the indigenous peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. choosing fsc certified products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the worlds forests. for a better future, choose fsc. 18 7 3 7 3 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 1 star 65 18 7 3 7 7 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the espresso size 39.37d x 19.69w x 16.93h verified purchase i needed a coffee table and i saw this one and read the reviews so i went for it. overall, its a nice piece. the finish seems a little fragile so use coasters and dont put anything with rough edges on it. if a big dog jumps up on this, its all over. the pull up table is okay but a touch wobbly. i really dont use that part of it but i do enjoy the storage. my only issue is that its rather small once you get it set up. id love the table more if it was twice as long. also, they should really pre assemble this and just ship it so you showed up on my doorstep so i didnt have to go to the store, deal with salespeople, wait a month, schedule the delivery. it just showed up with prime. id recommend and id get this again for another june 19, 2024 color retro brown size 39.37d x 19.69w x 16.93h verified purchase i was reluctant to buy this, due to needing to downgrade my original coffee table which was very sturdy but too large for my family room and lacking adequate storage. after some quick comparisons to other brands and reading reviews, i chose this one. the reluctancy was due to the material as i know mdf is just not a long term solution. putting it together was actually a breeze, i dont really understand the negative reviews mentioning this because i was able to put this together in about half an hour the instructions, although minimal, are pretty clear and simple. overall it actually is pretty nice and the size was perfect for my family room which is fairly small. my one issue is with the lift top itself its pretty awkward to lift and wobbly. im afraid over time this will only proceed to get worse but i knew going into this that this coffee table was not a long term solution but good enough for at least a 2 year life span if taken care of properly. long story short for a lower budget option, the look is very nice and if styled correctly can really stand out. the biggest drawback is the sturdiness of the lifts and ease of use of the lift feature. read more 3 people found this helpful helpful report mark joven 5.0 out of 5 stars need a work area near your sleeping area this is the materials, andor other controlled wood sources. as certified by the forest stewardship council the forest stewardship council the forest stewardship council fsc supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. choosing fsc certified products whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the indigenous peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. choosing fsc certified products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the worlds customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the appearance, ease of assembly, and value for money of the furniture. they mention it looks nice, is cute for small spaces, and the instructions are clear. some also like the storage capacity and functionality. however, some customers differ on the build quality and hardware. ai generated from the text of customer reviews select to learn more looks nice ease of assembly value for money size storage capacity functionality build quality hardware 81 customers the forest stewardship council the forest stewardship council the forest stewardship council fsc supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. choosing fsc certified products whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the indigenous peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. choosing fsc certified products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the worlds forests. for a better future, choose fsc. learn more customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the sturdiness, storage capacity, and appearance of the ottoman. they mention its big enough to store a bunch of their kiddos toys, blankets, or other items. some appreciate the ease of assembly, functionality, and value for money. however, some customers dislike the united states on march 17, 2024 color dark blue size 43w verified purchase i bought this ottoman as an attractive option for hiding toys, blankets and everything else that ends up on my living room floor..and it delivered plus some. its big enough to store a bunch of my kiddos toys, blankets, or even some of those bulky winter clothes that just take up so much space. and let me tell you, having that extra storage has been a blessing for keeping the living room from looking like a toy bomb exploded. now, besides being this magic box that swallows clutter, its also pretty sturdy. ive sat on it more times than i can count, and its held up like a champ, making it a nice little spot to plop down and have a coffee break. the kids also use it as a makeshift stage for their performances, and its survived, so thats saying something. the fact that it folds is pretty neat too. i mean, i havent had to fold it away yet because its constantly in use, but its nice to know that if we ever needed to, we could easily tuck it away. plus, assembling it was a piece of cake, which is always a huge plus because who has the time for complicated setups, right however, its not all rainbows and butterflies. the material isnt the most luxurious its more on the practical side. so if youre looking for something that screams elegance and high end, this might not hit the mark. also, because its so functional and useful, it tends to become a bit of a catch all. sometimes, it feels like im constantly fishing things out of it or reminding the kids not to just shove everything in there. but honestly, for the price and the sheer utility of it, those cons are pretty minor. its kind of become a must have for me in keeping a semblance of order with the chaos of kids running around. so yeah, big thumbs up from our goal is to make the most comfortable, convenient and durable sofa for our customers, and bring a convenient and comfortable experience to everyone,quality and comfort are our top priorities. this sofa is such a functional and aesthetic furniture set for limited space. it is durable and well balanced with its solid construction. the linen fabric an understated simple yet touch. and the classic coloring and sleek design can perfectly blend with any style of home dcor. in small space it is also possible to have both a sofa and a bed. multifunction 4 in 1 couch be easily and quickly converted from a chair to a sofa, lounger or sleeper bed in just a few steps,the sleeper bed can accommodate your overnight guests. it can meet any of your needs. elegant ottoman the ottoman can go virtually anywhere ,makeup room,dresser room,next to the sofa, in the corner of the room or adjacent to the entertainment system. love seat sofa comfy couch loveseat sofa chair,perfect for movie night, home office, sitting area for working, reading area and playing games. compact single bed when someone who wants to stay overnight comes to your house, you can put on a mat and used as a temporary bed. when the guest is gone, you can put it away and use it as an ottoman. simple lounge the longue is seen as a useful item for the modern home. it can be used to complement a homes dcor such as living or reading rooms, or as a stylish boudoir chair for bedroom seating. no matter what room it is, whether it is a large room or a small room, this is your best choice armrest side storage bag the armrest side storage bag, you can put tv remotes, game controller,thermos cup,magazine and pens,save your space.make your sofa tidier. wood feet durable solid wood feet designed to prevent scratching floors and can hold up to 350 lbs. 2 throw pillow soft 2 throw pillow to provide great support and comfort for sitting, relying, sleeping. you and your family must need a relaxing and pleasant space for them to rest, entertainment,watch tv and party it can not only integrate into different home decoration styles, but also exist in the living room,bedroom,motorhome,hallway,companys lounges enjoy your relax 9 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 2 star 63 17 9 3 8 3 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 1 star 63 17 9 3 8 8 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews exceeds their expectations. some also like its versatility and functionality. however, some customers have mixed opinions on the comfort and firmness. ai generated from the text of customer reviews
