stars light blue review crazy that this is only 170 so versatile and comfortable enough i was doing a living room update and wanted to keep things in budget. furniture is absolutely ridiculously priced these days, ahem joybird cough cough...i didnt need hand crafted artisinal pieces from finland or something... now, this is not a super beautiful piece... its not going to win any awards.but its cheap and versatile so it fit my needs and standards. i replaced the wheels with heavy duty casters that swivel so i could push the ottoman around with relative easy... the wheels that came with it for the pull out part are static wheels to pull the piece straight in and out... i dont use the pull out too often but i do appreciate that its there if someone comes to visit and we watch a film or tv show etc, i want them to be able to relax and pull the bed portion out if they want to. since i do use it as an ottoman, i did not install the back piece. i dont really mind the black portion but if you have kids the two metal slots for the backpiece can be sharp if bumped into.... so just a word of warning if you also do not want to use the backpiece.adding a back piece kinda defeats the purpose of an ottoman in my opinion... but to each their own. the fabric is funky but cool enough that it fits in my room. i have a the flutterby multi color rug by ruggable and the color of blue works perfectly without being too matchy matchy... it also looks great next to my tan leather couch and pink velvet loveseatchair...ive used it to read on and like the adjustable back... i could probably sleep on it if i really had to but i havent napped on it really. its cozy enough to lay on though. attached photos of the pull out portion along with the wheels i installed that were like 8 for 4.worth the upgrade for how i use the piece.for the price, what are you waiting for get itoh i also painted the wood legs gold... just cuz i like having gold accents in my living room. did the same for my pink velvet chair more hide thank you for your feedback close sorry, there was an error close sorry we couldnt load the review try again sort reviews by top reviews most recent top reviews in the united states on august 9, 2024 color light blue verified purchase this sleeper sofa is a great space saving option for small apartments, dorm rooms or home offices. while it performs well as a compact loveseat or ottoman during the day, it easily folds out to a single bed for overnight guests. the light blue upholstery has a modern, clean lined look that will fit into most decor styles. it also has adjustable backrests and armrests for customizable comfort while seating two. as with many futon style couch beds, this one is quite firm and not the most cushiony seat. however, for the price and versatility in a tight space, its difficult to beat. the fold out mattress is comfortable enough for one person to sleep on. overall, this 4 in 1 futon couchottomanloveseat is a practical furniture piece that saves space without compromising functionality. its transformable design makes it suitable for small living quarters like apartments, dorms or home offices. read more 13 people easy assembly introduction space saving the clever size design allows a smaller table to be placed under a larger table, saves space and keeps your home tidy. simple installation not only with the installation manual, we also made an installation instruction video and uploaded it on the page for your reference. multiple uses these tables can be placed in the living room or bedroom room as needed. it can be used as a side table or as a bedside table to place lamps and books. the elegant and retro design makes it very suitable for many home decorations. specifications large table  23.6 17.7 inches small table  15.7 15.7 inches large table load capacity 99lbs small table load capacity 66lbs plate thickness 0.59 inches materials steel frame mdf board strong and durable made of denser and uniform particle board, the walnut patterned desktop has a retro and elegant appearance. the thickness is 0.59, and the surface is scratch resistant and waterproof, which is very strong and durable. adjustable non slip foot pads the table feet are non slip, and the plastic pad at the bottom avoids scratching the floor. it is suitable for wooden floors, tile floors, etc. if your floor is uneven, you can adjust the height with the screws of the foot pads to avoid tilting the table. sturdy metal stand supports fastened with double screws, the sturdy metal stand supports your desktop smoothly. the metal surface has been rust proofed and is extremely durable. the edges of the bracket are smooth, making it safer to use. free combination the nesting coffee tables include a large table  23.6 19.7 inch and a small table  15.7 16.3 inch. small table can be placed under the bigger one. you can combine them as you like. brief content visible, double tap to read full content. full learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 1 star 81 11 4 2 3 3 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the ease of assembly, size, and sturdiness of the desk. they mention its simple yet aesthetically pleasing, perfect for a small area, and has great stability. some appreciate the foldability and appearance. additionally, customers like the value for money, functionality, and ease of movement. ai generated from the text of customer reviews select to learn more ease of assembly size sturdiness foldability all photos previous page next page all photos amazon customer 4 out of 5 stars wohomo folding computer desk a compact solution for small spaces 1. problem i was trying to solvei needed a compact desk for my small new york city apartment that could easily be set up for work and just as easily be stored away when not in use. with limited space, i wanted something versatile that wouldnt dominate my living area.2. did it solve the problemyes, the wohomo folding computer desk solved my problem perfectly its foldable design makes it ideal for small spaces, allowing me to quickly set up a workstation and then tuck it away when im done working.3. space saving designthis desks foldable design is a lifesaver in a tight living space. it folds completely flat, allowing me to store it under my bed or against a wall without taking up much room. its perfect for people who need flexibility in their home office setup.4. easy assemblyassembly was a breeze. it took me less than 10 minutes to set it up right out of the box, and it doesnt require any tools. simply unfold the legs, and its ready to use. its as easy as it gets for a desk5. durability and buildthe rustic walnut finish adds a touch of elegance and fits well with any decor. despite its lightweight nature, the desk is quite sturdy and has held up well under the weight of my laptop, monitor, and a few desk accessories. it doesnt wobble, which is crucial when im typing away.6. functionalityat 31.5 inches, this desk is spacious enough for a laptop and other essentials, making it perfect for writing, working on projects, or even as a study desk for students. its the right size for a small room or even a nook in your living area.7. portabilityone of the highlights of this desk is its portability. i can easily move it from my living room to my bedroom or anywhere else in the apartment, thanks to its lightweight design. its great for someone like me who loves rearranging furniture frequently.8. final thoughtsthe wohomo folding computer desk is a practical and stylish solution for anyone dealing with limited space. its ease of use, compact design, and sturdy build make it a must have for small apartments or dorm rooms. if youre looking for a functional yet space saving desk, i highly recommend this one more hide thank you for your feedback close sorry, there was an error close sorry we couldnt load the united states on august 5, 2024 size small size31.5 x 15.7 color brown verified purchase 1. problem i was trying to solve i needed a compact desk for my small new york city apartment that could easily be set up for work and just as easily be stored away when not in use. with limited space, i wanted something versatile that wouldnt dominate my living area. 2. did it solve the problem yes, the wohomo folding computer desk solved my problem perfectly its foldable design makes it ideal for small spaces, allowing me to quickly set up a workstation and then tuck it away when im done working. 3. space saving design this desks foldable design is a lifesaver in a tight living space. it folds completely flat, allowing me to store it under my bed or against a wall without taking up much room. its perfect for people who need flexibility in their home office setup. 4. easy assembly assembly was a breeze. it took me less than 10 minutes to set it up right out of the box, and it doesnt require any tools. simply unfold the legs, and its ready to use. its as easy as it gets for a desk 5. durability and build the rustic walnut finish adds a touch of elegance and fits well with any decor. despite its lightweight nature, the desk is quite sturdy and has held up well under the weight of my laptop, monitor, and a few desk accessories. it doesnt wobble, which is crucial when im typing away. 6. functionality at 31.5 inches, this desk is spacious enough for a laptop and other essentials, making it perfect for writing, working on projects, or even as a study desk for students. its the right size for a small room or even a nook in your living area. 7. portability one of the highlights of this desk is its portability. i can easily move it from my living room to my bedroom or anywhere else in the apartment, thanks to its lightweight design. its great for someone like me who loves rearranging furniture frequently. 8. final thoughts the wohomo folding computer desk is a practical and stylish solution for anyone dealing with limited space. its ease of use, compact design, and sturdy build make it a must have for small apartments or dorm rooms. if youre looking for a functional yet space saving desk, i highly recommend this one read more rae zoe rozae 4.0 out of 5 stars wohomo folding computer desk a compact solution for small spaces reviewed in the united states on august 5, 2024 1. problem i was trying to solve i needed a compact desk for my small new york city apartment that could easily be set up for work and just as easily be stored away when not in use. with limited space, i wanted something versatile that wouldnt dominate my living area. 2. did it solve the problem yes, the wohomo folding computer desk solved my problem perfectly its foldable design makes it ideal for small spaces, allowing me to quickly set up a workstation and then tuck it away when im done working. 3. space saving design this desks foldable design is a lifesaver in a tight living space. it folds completely flat, allowing me to store it under my bed or against a wall without taking up much room. its perfect for people who need flexibility in their home office setup. 4. easy assembly assembly was a breeze. it took me less than 10 minutes to set it up right out of the box, and it doesnt require any tools. simply unfold the legs, and its ready to use. its as easy as it gets for a desk 5. durability and build the rustic walnut finish adds a touch of elegance and fits well with any decor. despite its lightweight nature, the desk is quite sturdy and has held up well under the weight of my laptop, monitor, and a few desk accessories. it doesnt wobble, which is crucial when im typing away. 6. functionality at 31.5 inches, this desk is spacious enough for a laptop and other essentials, making it perfect for writing, working on projects, or even as a study desk for students. its the right size for a small room or even a nook in your living area. 7. portability one of the highlights of this desk is its portability. i can easily move it from my living room to my bedroom or anywhere else in the apartment, thanks to its lightweight design. its great for someone like me who loves rearranging furniture frequently. 8. final thoughts the wohomo folding computer desk is a practical and stylish solution for anyone dealing with limited space. its ease of use, compact design, and sturdy build make it a must have for small apartments or dorm rooms. if youre looking for a functional yet space saving desk, i highly recommend this one images in this review 12 star 1 star 66 14 9 4 7 7 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the appearance, ease of installation, and quality of the shelves. they mention they look great, are user friendly, and bring out their room. however, some customers have issues with the tilt and mixed opinions on sturdiness, horrible. i put it in my wall and the shelf was straight and tilted towards me and extremely wobbly. i went and got new anchors and attempted to take out the old ones. they would not come out and i had to rip them out and it made a deep and biggish hole. 4. so, i had to patch them up. its past the return, bummed cause i like the look but its been a pain to put these shelves up. a simple project has turned into a headache. if you get these dont use the anchor it came with, new anchors will be better. once again, the look itself is great, anchors are a huge downfall. read more rajshree ojha quality wall anchors. i originally used the ones that came with the package and the shelves could bear significantly less weight than advertised... any amount of weight had them sagging out from the wall. if you use quality wall anchors and dont put anything too heavy on them, these shelves will serve you well. read more 4 people found this helpful helpful report see more reviews top reviews from star 59 25 8 6 2 2 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the ease of assembly, sturdiness, and capacity of the shelf. they mention its super easy to put together, the instructions are easy to read, and there are no tools required. some say it holds many stuffed animals and seems like it will last long. ai features recognized by trusted certifications. forestry practices made with materials from well managed forests, recycled materials, andor other controlled wood sources. as certified by the forest stewardship council the forest stewardship council the forest stewardship council fsc supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. choosing fsc certified products whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the indigenous peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. choosing fsc certified products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the worlds forests. for a better future, choose fsc. learn more about this star 1 star 65 19 9 4 4 4 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the ease of assembly, appearance, again sort reviews by top reviews most recent top reviews top reviews from the united states there was a problem filtering reviews right now. please try again later. bernadette rosenstiel, d.c. 5.0 out of 5 stars an excellent peoduct, better than expected reviewed in the united states on august 1, 2023 color light grey verified purchase i first purchased the devaise 3 a few weeks ago, and was so happy with it that i decided to also buy the singe tower devaise 2. as good as the assembly and product hardare were with the 3 model, the 2 was even better better bag labeling, with extra screws, etc. in the event of a mishap or missing piece. the quality for all of the components is very good and everything was conscientiously labeled and accounted for. ive bought my share of self assembly tables and file cabs over the years, including a ton of ikea products, for home and business, but i must say that this line is hands down the most impressive ive seen to date. both tables were smartly packaged to avoid shipping damage, and promptly delivered with amazon prime. more importantly, the directions were accurate and relatively easy to follow. at 75 years, my eyes arent what they used to be, but the quality of printing allowed me to double check myself with a magnifying glass. as with many off shore assembly guides, the text and written instructions were minimal, but the illustrations alone were clear and fairly easy to follow. assembly took about an hour, slightly less on the smaller 2. a couple of simple tools were provided, but as i have carpal tunnel, i used an electric screwdriver on several of the assembly steps to be able to tighten the various nuts and bolts appropriately. i also used a couple of regular screwdrivers. the engineering of these units is simple, efficient and well...to use that word again...smart. the finished tables are quite sturdy for home office use, as intended. these folks know what they are doing. i did manage to over tighten a couple of shelf screws on the 2, slightly cracking on shelf. just enough to reach out to their support, and i will update this post with the results. lightweight, study, attractive and relatively easy to assemble. all in all, i would absolutely recommend this line of home office tables and file cabinets read more bernadette rosenstiel, d.c. 5.0 out of 5 stars an excellent peoduct, better than expected reviewed in the united states on august 1, 2023 i first purchased the devaise 3 a few weeks ago, and was so happy with it that i decided to also buy the singe tower devaise 2. as good as the assembly and product hardare were with the 3 model, the 2 was even better better bag labeling, with extra screws, etc. in the event of a mishap or missing piece. the quality for all of the components is very good and everything was conscientiously labeled and accounted for. ive bought my share of self assembly tables and file cabs over the years, including a ton of ikea products, for home and business, but i must say that this line is hands down the most impressive ive seen to date. both tables were smartly packaged to avoid shipping damage, and promptly delivered with amazon prime. more importantly, the directions were accurate and relatively easy to follow. at 75 years, my eyes arent what they used to be, but the quality of printing allowed me to double check myself with a magnifying glass. as with many off shore assembly guides, the text and written instructions were minimal, but the illustrations alone were clear and fairly easy to follow. assembly took about an hour, slightly less on the smaller 2. a couple of simple tools were provided, but as i have carpal tunnel, i used an electric screwdriver on several of the assembly steps to be able to tighten the various nuts and bolts appropriately. i also used a couple of regular screwdrivers. the engineering of these units is simple, efficient and well...to use that word again...smart. the finished tables are quite sturdy for home office use, as intended. these folks know what they are doing. i did manage to over tighten a couple of shelf screws on the 2, slightly cracking on shelf. just enough to reach out to their support, and i will update this post with the results. lightweight, study, attractive and relatively easy to assemble. all in all, i would absolutely recommend this line of home office tables report robert w 4.0 out of 5 stars good for modest home use reviewed in the united states on march 28, 2023 color black verified purchase item has a steel frame which makes it sturdier than expected from something that uses cloth and cardboard for drawers. sill, those materials make it lightweight and easy to move around. plywood top sturdy enough for all in one printercopier. the file drawer seems adequate for light, hanging file home use, but it probably wouldnt hold up to office type stuffed files. this is a typical chinese flat box furniture do it yourself in 13 steps project with the usual flimsy tools and not much in the way of english instructions. however, the pictures are pretty good for chinese instructions, with a couple of expanded view inserts. also, you get extra screws and nuts for the very real possibility of dropping and losing one of the small pieces. unless you have size extra small hands, putting the sliders on the drawers will require a pair of pliers to hold the very small fasteners. overall though, assembly is not bad for a chinese flat box project, and one should be able to get it done in 1 3 hours, depending on experience with similar items. read more when you need multiple computers to work together. unique slot design could hold tablet, cell phones and manage cables, pens, clips, and other office supplies. upgraded product dimension this monitor stand riser maximum 40.9 inch in length, holds up to 55 lbs, both increased by 15. this dual monitor riser brings you a more convenient home and office life. adjustable lengthangle freely adjust the angle as you need. the length can be adjusted from the minimum 29.13 inch to the maximum 40.9 inch. this dual monitor riser could help you to form a comfortable sitting position and gain a better viewing experience. ergonomic double monitor riser raise your monitor by 3.9, helping you to keep a good sitting posture and prevent the possible stress on neck, back and shoulder during your long time of work. large desk organizer lift your monitors by the desktop shelf, provides three storage spaces underneath to organize your office supplies and accessories like keyboards, office files, notebook, calculator. this dual monitor stand helps you to get rid of messy desk, and keep your working space tidy. see more product details report an issue with this product or seller frequently star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the ease of assembly, functionality, and appearance of the product. they mention it comes with clear and concise instructions, works well for raising monitors, and has extra storage space. some also like the space and adjustability. however, some customers have different opinions on sturdiness, value for money, and size. ai generated out of 5 stars great monitor stand reviewed in the united states on august 16, 2024 color black verified purchase this monitor stand accomplished all i needed it to. it elevates my monitor for more comfort, provides extra storage space on top as well as below, and is moveable which allows for better organization on my desk. the side sections can be installed so that they pivot or can be pulled out and pushed in. it was quick and easy to put together and is lightweight. read more helpful report crystal thompson 5.0 out of 5 stars does it for me reviewed in the united states on february 7, 2024 color black verified purchase i needed something to lift these screens up to eye level. with my monitor and laptop just sitting on the table alone, my posture was suffering. when looking down at the screens, its like my body involuntarily wants to lean in closer to them, thus causing me to have that unsightly hump in my back. thats a no go even with looking at the measurements of the stands before buying them, i wasnt sure if three inches lifted off the table would be enough. i was pleasantly surprised once assembled. it was just enough to keep me from leaning forward. i think the nice little storage spaces underneath are nice too. turned my table into a nice little workstation assembly was easy, took about 20 30 mins. may even take you less time honestly. not much to put together. i saw in a review of the wood cracking where you are to screw the pieces together. that person must have really put a lot of force into over tightening because the individual pieces are tough. dont over tighten and you should not have any problems. functionality as i said before, it puts the screens at eye level for me. i guess this also depends on the height of your own desktable, your height, and the height of your chair. theres also the two swivel pieces that are to enable the swivel function should you choose to install them. i preferred not to install them as installing them will limit how far you can adjust the length of the stands. not installing them has not diminished the integrity of the stands in any way and they can still swivel. its sturdy so far and i dont see it falling apart anytime soon. i included a picture using one of the slots for an ipad so you can see how it looks but i havent used it for that until writing this review. id recommend. inexpensive. easy to assembly. does not feel cheap. does what it advertises. no more hunchback for me read more crystal thompson 5.0 out of 5 stars does it for me reviewed in the united states on february 7, 2024 i needed verified purchase i bought this because i liked the idea of not only getting my monitors to a better height, but because it offered storage. i have a set up that lets me switch from my work laptop to my personal tower style pc using the same monitors i use an hdmi 4x2 switch to save me from having to crawl under the desk. when im working, my personal keyboard and mouse can be tucked away neatly but still accessible if i want to game on my lunch or right after work. theres space for my hdmi switch and more counter space for my calendar, phone charger, etc. my cables are out of sight and out of my way. i like how much this raises my monitors. one is pretty old and doesnt go up and down anymore and its nice to only need one dictionary instead of a pile of them. i work hybrid and use my own monitors to extend my work computer. when im not working, i use the same monitors for my personal computer. the space underneath allows me to store the peripherals for whichever computer im not using along with my hdmi 4x2 switch, my glasses, and other bits and bobs that would take up space on my desk. i like the rail for my phone though it doesnt fit my ipad and the extra counter space for my calendar, soundbar and clock. it was easy to assemble think a really small ikea book shelf and i like the stability of the metal pegs keeping the three platforms together. if you have a smaller space, you wont be able to use the pegs, but it still feels very solid. much more solid than books piled up to raise my monitor. read more laura g 5.0 out of 5 stars raised my monitors and organized my desk 2 options from 109.99 2 options from 119.99 2 options from 135.99 purchase options and add ons brand monibloom product dimensions 23.5d x 41.5w x 31h color cleargrey style modern base material alloy steel finish type brushed special feature adjustable room type office, bedroom, living room, study room recommended uses for product drafting mounting type floor mount see more shape rectangular desk design drafting table top material type tempered glass number of drawers 2 about this item toughened glass desktop this toughened glass desktop is a durable and strong portable drafting table, art desk, drawing table or artist desk. it features filleted edges and rounded corners to prevent undesired injury or damage during moving and using. it can combine with a light to turn this drafting table into a light table, making it great for tracing and comic creation. adjustable desktop angle the angle of the glass desktop of this adjustable drawing table can be adjusted from 0 to 65 to meet your different needs. a pencil ledge on the bottom of the tabletop helps hold papers and stationery when the desktop is tilted. it is versatile and can be used as a computer table or writing table for drawing or working. large storage space this art table has 4 embedded stationery trays on both sides that can be freely arranged, several honeycomb pen holes and slots in different sizes on the trays help organize stationery and tools. moreover, two layers of non woven cloth drawers on the right can be pulled out silently, providing ample storage space. more stable this drafting table has a steel tube frame structure with reinforced bottom frame and t shaped legs, providing optimal stability and durability. the table remains stable and secure, providing a safe and reliable workspace for creative projects. versatile art desk not only does this drafting table work as an art drawing desk, diamond painting desk but also as a normal computer table or writing table. it is perfect for art, drafting, and creative tasks in the office, studio, or at home. 4 swivel casters 4 rubber feet this portable drafting table comes with 4 360 swivel casters for flexible mobility, 2 with brakes for easy locking of the table in position. the other 4 rubber feet will prevent it from destroying the floor, especially on wooden floors. easy to clean no more worries about spilled paint, coffee or pen marks as the tempered glass top and waterproof powder coated metal stand of this drawing desk can be easily cleaned with a damp cloth and mild cleanser. see more product details additional details product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers stars images in this review reviews with images see all photos previous page next page all photos amazon customer 5 out of 5 stars took a full day to assemble i got it assembled by myself. i need to tell you something about me. i am 93 years old. it was a challenge to assemble, and i managed to get the top half done and i assembled the bottom half as well. however, i have a painful back so i couldnt lift the top onto the bottom without assistance from a friend. he lifted the desk onto the frame and it was a joy to realize that i actually did it now i have a few suggs for the manufacturer the storage on the right will dump all the contents onto the floor when the table is lifted to a slope. one needs to remove all the contents first and when adjusting the slope, one must lift the entire table all the way to full extent, then lowere it down to where you need it. i also find the small shelfbasket under the desk is pretty useless because one needs to lean way down or stand on ones head in order to see what is on the shelf. other than these issues, i am very glad i purchased the desk. i use it for painting watercolors and now have a place to work and not have to use my dining table. i think it is very well designed and is very sturdy. i like the side extension on the left to put my pallet and instead of lifting the top up and down, i use a small easel ifi want to put my drawing board at an angle. i am very glad that i purchased this product. more hide thank you for your feedback close sorry, there was an error close sorry we couldnt load the review try again people found this helpful helpful report gary breton 4.0 out of 5 stars extremely high quality reviewed in the united states on august 29, 2024 color naturalblack verified purchase this is an excellent product well designed and well made with high quality. unfortunately, i am missing item 33 and amazon cannot send replacement parts . read more helpful report customer review 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent for diamond painting paint by number reviewed in the united states on february 1, 2024 color cleargrey verified purchase very happy with this drafting table. i use it mainly for diamond painting and paint by number. its great for painting because the top is glass and any paint can be easily washed or scraped off without damaging the tabletop. my diamond painting light pad also likes the glass surface as well and the non slip feet stay firmly in place even when tilted fairly steep. i dont use the drawers because for my needs, i have a roller drawer bin that i pull up right next to me with most of my supplies inside and the drawers were not going to be able to hold all my stuff. i also found that the drawers were more in the way of my legs and chair, prohibiting me from being seated in the middle of the table so i removed them completely. i like the side holders but i only installed them on the right side im right handed and its perfect for holding tweezers, scissors, washi tape and brushes but i left it off the left side so i can use my clip light along that side easier the bracket just gets in the way otherwise. i use mine in my dining room and i appreciate it having wheels so i can move it easily to another room when we have company. the tilt function is easy to use although unless im doing something wrong, needs to be tilted all the way up in order to put it back down to start over. when you have work already attached to the table and tools in the side pocket, that is not an ideal situation. not a deal breaker but more of an inconvenience. i use this table for hours at a time and it is one of my two best purchases for my crafting needs. assembly was fairly quick and easy but make certain you pay attention to which way the front is facing in instructions so the sides are correct since one is different than the other due to the drawers. also dont fully tighten the screws until the end, have some play, otherwise it can end up wonky and more difficult to assemble. i did have some trouble getting all the screws through when putting on the glass top but i managed to get them all in. theres a little foam pad on the underside to protect the glass but it blocks the screw hole some we not pre poked open the screws didnt know where to go so i used a sharp screw to poke the holes open from underneath and then used the machine screws that came with the table to complete the attachment. overall very happy with this table and would absolutely purchase from them again. read more 5 people found this helpful helpful report jmontalvo 1.0 out of 5 stars rusted parts reviewed in the united states on july 11, 2024 color whiteblack verified purchase its a beautiful table but parts came rusted and bent brackets. its desk for multifunction this computer desk is simple but practical that allows you to work, write, and type in a comfortable and organized way. its perfect use as a computer desk, office desk, writing table, gaming desk, makeup desk, console table. multi functional monitor stand this modern computer desk has an incredible multi functional monitor stand. the size of this desk monitor stand allows you to have two monitors at the same level. this computer desk with monitor shelf not only allow you to have more storage space on the desktop and raises your screen for improved visibility, but also you can install the monitor stand under the desk to turn this monitor stand into an under table bookshelf. reversible storage shelves this gaming table with a monitor stand has two spacious and adjustable open shelves for storage. this desk with shelves is reversible that can be installed on either left or right. the adjustable shelf of computer desk allows you to store different sizes of stuff, such as computer hosts, books, office stationeries, and small devices. the reversible open shelf design of the office desk keeps everything easy to reach and organize. modern industrial feature this home office desk with storage has a large piece of high end mdf board with the popular rustic brown walnut veneers, a high quality contrasting stainless steel base in rustic black matte black writing desk creates a special modern industrial charm that can easily match any style of home or office furniture. scratch resistance surface the home office desk top is made of medium density fiberboard with two layers of a glossy finish which gives a smooth and high end classic outlook to the work desk and this finish provides a great waterproof surface and scratch resistance. the adjustable footpads on the bottom can keep the desk stable on the uneven floor and prevent you scratch the floor by moving this wood computer desk. see more product details additional details small whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the ease of again later. amazon customer 5.0 out of 5 stars i love my new desk reviewed in the united states on march 27, 2024 color rustic size 47 inch verified purchase as an avid crafter and someone who spends considerable time at my computer, finding the right desk is crucial for both comfort and functionality. the minosys gamingcomputer desk caught my eye with its unique design, compact size, and promise of versatility. heres my review design and style the minosys desk boasts a rustic charm that sets it apart from traditional gaming or computer desks. its sleek yet minimalist design fits well in a variety of room settings, adding a touch of sophistication to any space. the addition of a monitor stand not only elevates the aesthetic appeal but also provides ergonomic benefits by ensuring the screen is at eye level, reducing neck strain during long gaming or work sessions. despite its compact size, this desk offers ample surface area for my paints, brushes, goops, sprays and other accessories. the desk features a sturdy construction that can support the weight of multiple projects or vigorous crafting without wobbling or instability. assembly of the desk was straightforward, thanks to clear instructions and well labeled parts. the quality of materials used is evident, with durable construction that feels solid and reliable. the desks rustic finish adds character while providing resistance to scratches and wear, ensuring long lasting durability even with regular use. in my opinion the minosys gamingcomputer desk is a stylish and functional addition to any crafting workspace. its compact size make it a versatile option for gamers, students, or professionals alike. its simplicity, durability, and ergonomic benefits make it a worthy investment for anyone in need help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews there was a problem filtering reviews right now. please try again later. bernadette rosenstiel, d.c. 5.0 out of 5 stars an excellent peoduct, better than expected reviewed in the united states on august 1, 2023 color light grey verified purchase i first purchased the devaise 3 a few weeks ago, and was so happy with it that i decided to also buy the singe tower devaise 2. as good as the assembly and product hardare were with the 3 model, the 2 was even better better bag labeling, with extra screws, etc. in the event of a mishap or missing piece. the quality for all of the components is very good and everything was conscientiously labeled and accounted for. ive bought my share of self assembly tables and file cabs over the years, including a ton of ikea products, for home and business, but i must say that this line is hands down the most impressive ive seen to date. both tables were smartly packaged to avoid shipping damage, and promptly delivered with amazon prime. more importantly, the directions were accurate and relatively easy to follow. at 75 years, my eyes arent what they used to be, but the quality of printing allowed me to double check myself with a magnifying glass. as with many off shore assembly guides, the text and written instructions were minimal, but the illustrations alone were clear and fairly easy to follow. assembly took about an hour, slightly less on the smaller 2. a couple of simple tools were provided, but as i have carpal tunnel, i used an electric screwdriver on several of the assembly steps to be able to tighten the various nuts and bolts appropriately. i also used a couple of regular screwdrivers. the engineering of these units is simple, efficient and well...to use that word again...smart. the finished tables are quite sturdy for home office use, as intended. these folks know what they are doing. i did manage to over tighten a couple of shelf screws on the 2, slightly cracking on shelf. just enough to reach out to their support, and i will update this post with the results. lightweight, study, attractive and relatively easy to assemble. all in all, i would absolutely recommend this line of home office tables and file cabinets read more bernadette rosenstiel, d.c. 5.0 out of 5 stars an excellent peoduct, better than expected reviewed in the united states on august 1, 2023 i first purchased the devaise 3 a few weeks ago, and was so happy with it that i decided to also buy the singe tower devaise 2. as good as the assembly and product hardare were with the 3 model, the 2 was even better better bag labeling, with extra screws, etc. in the event of a mishap or missing piece. the quality for all of the components is very good and everything was conscientiously labeled and accounted for. ive bought my share of self assembly tables and file cabs over the years, including a ton of ikea products, for home and business, but i must say that this line is hands down the most impressive ive seen to date. both tables were smartly packaged to avoid shipping damage, and promptly delivered with amazon prime. more importantly, the directions were accurate and relatively easy to follow. at 75 years, my eyes arent what they used to be, but the quality of printing allowed me to double check myself with a magnifying glass. as with many off shore assembly guides, the text and written instructions were minimal, but the illustrations alone were clear and fairly easy to follow. assembly took about an hour, slightly less on the smaller 2. a couple of simple tools were provided, but as i have carpal tunnel, i used an electric screwdriver on several of the assembly steps to be able to tighten the various nuts and bolts appropriately. i also used a couple of regular screwdrivers. the engineering of these units is simple, efficient and well...to use that word again...smart. the finished tables are quite sturdy for home office use, as intended. these folks know what they are doing. i did manage to over tighten a couple of shelf screws on the 2, slightly cracking on shelf. just enough to reach out to their support, and i will update this post with the results. lightweight, study, attractive and relatively easy to assemble. all in all, i would absolutely recommend this line of home office tables and file cabinets images in this review 14 people found this helpful helpful report states on march 28, 2023 color black verified purchase item has a steel frame which makes it sturdier than expected from something that uses cloth and cardboard for drawers. sill, those materials make it lightweight and easy to move around. plywood top sturdy enough for all in one printercopier. the file drawer seems adequate for light, hanging file home use, but it probably wouldnt hold up to office type stuffed files. this is a typical chinese flat box furniture do it yourself in 13 steps project with the usual flimsy tools and not much in the way of english instructions. however, the pictures are pretty good for chinese instructions, with a couple of expanded view inserts. also, you get extra screws and nuts for the very real possibility of dropping and losing one of the small pieces. unless you have size extra small hands, putting the sliders on the drawers will require a pair of pliers to hold the very small fasteners. overall though, assembly is not bad for a chinese flat box project, and one should be able to get it done in 1 3 hours, depending on experience with similar items. read more 14 people found this helpful helpful report see more reviews top about this 5 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the sturdiness, ease of assembly, and appearance of the bed. they mention its secure, adds a nice touch to any bedroom decor, and is good value for money. some appreciate the functionality. however, some customers differ on the size and drawers. ai generated price reviewed in the united states on august 28, 2024 color light grey size queen style modern verified purchase ive put together a lot of furniture over the years. this bed is sturdy the parts were good quality and the instructions easy to follow. it only takes a single included allen wrench to assemble. the wrench could be better to ease assembly but its a one time use and then thrown away. the fit and finish is good. while the headboard isnt grand or plush, it simple and elegant. once completely assembled the bed is sturdy. at first the wood slats seem undersized, but once the mattress is on i couldnt tell. it would take an adult to jump up and down on the mattress to possibly break it. dont plan on putting heavy items in the drawers as they are wire baskets on wheels. they are great for winter clothes, wrapping paper, spare linens etc.. im using this bed in a guest room. it would be great for kidsteen bedrooms and if your on a budget the master bedroom. 5 for sturdiness, style, and assembly. 4 on the drawers. this is a post assembly review, not a long term review. read more 18 people found this helpful helpful report justin 4.0 out of 5 stars nice bed reviewed in the united the united states on august 7, 2024 color light grey size queen style antique verified purchase assembled and started using this a few days ago, and im so happy with it. the frame itself is super sturdy and stable, all metal pieces and thick screwsbolts, with very precise dimensions not allowing it to wiggle around at all, so its squeak free so far. every piece was labeled and the instructions pamphlet was easy to follow, with all the screws and other tiny pieces very well packaged and labeled as well. the cloth on the headboard, footboard and draws is soft and decent quality. the gray is bit better looking in person than in the photos, it should be pretty versatile to work with your decor. pros very solid, sturdy easy ish assembly lot of steps, but easy to follow instructions very, very high quality for the price great engineering cons its super heavy when assembled, you will likely have to disassemble it to move it to another home the wooden support slats use thick plastic pegs instead of bolts to attach to the frame the pegs may dry rot over time and need to be replaced with bolts summary im super happy with this purchase, and honestly think it will be worth the disassembly and reassembly for our next move. if it suits your fashion, i highly recommend. read more natasha a kurtz 5.0 out of 5 stars great quality, very happy reviewed in the united states on august 7, 2024 it to wiggle around at all, so its squeak free so far. every piece was labeled and the instructions pamphlet was easy to follow, with all the screws and other tiny pieces very well packaged and labeled as well. the cloth on the headboard, footboard and draws is soft and decent quality. the gray is bit better looking in person than in the photos, it should be pretty versatile to work with your decor. pros very solid, sturdy easy ish assembly lot of steps, but easy to follow instructions very, very high quality for the price great engineering cons its super heavy when assembled, you will likely have to disassemble it to move it to another home the wooden support slats use thick plastic pegs instead of bolts to attach to the frame the pegs may dry rot over time and need to be replaced with bolts summary im super happy with this purchase, and honestly think it will be worth the disassembly and reassembly for our next move. if it suits your fashion, i highly recommend. reviewed in the united states on february 19, 2024 color dark grey size king style modern verified purchase i recently upgraded to the allewie upholstered king size platform bed frame with 4 storage drawers and headboard, and it has exceeded all expectations, earning a solid 5 star rating. this bed frame seamlessly blends style with functionality, providing a luxurious sleeping space with added storage convenience. design and construction the upholstered headboard adds a touch of sophistication, creating a focal point in the bedroom. the neutral color complements various decor styles, allowing for easy integration into any room. the quality of the upholstery is evident, providing both comfort and durability. storage drawers the four spacious storage drawers integrated into the bed frame are a game changer for those seeking additional space in the bedroom. these drawers effortlessly slide in and out, offering a discreet and organized solution for storing extra linens, clothing, or personal items. the design ensures that the drawers are seamlessly integrated, maintaining the overall aesthetic appeal of the bed. sturdiness and support the platform design eliminates the need for a box spring, providing excellent support for the mattress. the construction is robust, and the bed frame feels solid and secure. even with the added storage drawers, there is no compromise on stability. easy assembly one notable feature is the straightforward assembly process. the instructions are clear, and all necessary tools are provided. the bed frame came together seamlessly, and i appreciated the attention to detail in the assembly instructions. overall comfort beyond its practical features, the allewie bed frame offers a comfortable and inviting sleeping space. the padded headboard provides a supportive surface for sitting up and reading or watching tv. in conclusion, the allewie upholstered king size platform bed frame has transformed my bedroom into a stylish and organized sanctuary. its a perfect blend of elegance and practicality, and the added storage drawers are a true asset. if youre in search of a high quality, functional, and aesthetically pleasing bed frame, look no further. highly recommended read more 28 people found this helpful helpful report see more reviews top reviews from other countries translate all reviews to english atakawa 3.0 out of 5 mount see more shape rectangular desk design standing desk top material type wood number of drawers 2 about this item ergonomic healthy stylethe ergonomic electric standing desk allows you to release your hands and effortlessly customize the desired height between 28.7 48. with a high quality motor, our adjustable desk operates quietly at less than 55db and can be used with confidence even in the quietest room. precise stable adjustmentdesigned to cater to your needs, our stand up desk design features an led display and 3 memory presets, helping you make precise and quick adjustments. the robust wooden desktop and the t shaped steel frame ensure maximum stability and can hold up to 176 lbs. suitable for daily use stay organized with our sit stand desk which comes equipped with 2 hooks on either side and 2 wire collecting holes on the desktop, making it an easy and convenient option for daily use. the eco friendly wood is sleek, easy to clean, and odor free. more choicesour stand up desk is available in a range of colors and sizes, making it an ideal choice for a computer desk, writing desk and more. whether its in your living room, study, bedroom, or any other space, its always a great addition. easy assemblythe package includes a height adjustable desk, an instruction manual, and necessary tools for assembly. you can easily put it together using our installation video. when detecting obstacles during movement. 2 wire holes the desktop is equipped with two wire holes, which help to store the wires and make your desktop more neat and tidy. 2 hooks the standing desk is whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the this review reviews with images see all photos previous page next page all photos amazon customer 4 out of 5 stars as advertised with a few minor cosmetic issues i only docked one star because of the cosmetic issues as it was fresh out of the box and already had some paint chips and a small dent on the underside of the desktop. these are very minor, and arent really visible once all assembled, but still kind of upsetting for it being a brand new deskthe instructions were very easy to read, except for one part, where it says to rotate clockwise to make the right leg go down. if you are following the orientation shown in the drawing, you should turn counter clockwise to make the left leg go down. it was easy to figure out, so no biggie. aside from that, everything was very clear and there were even extras of each screw included the steps and images are simple and clear.the mechanism works wonderfully, granted it has only been 1 hour since i have started using it. as far as noise goes, it kind of sounds like if your neighbor was vaccuming. so its not noisy at all, but also not completely silent. you wouldnt be bothering your roommate in the next bedroom, but might annoy someone you are sharing a bedroom with.the presets are easy to set.something to note is that the table for the motor is attached to the motor. seems like common sense, but i spent 10 minutes looking for this extra cable until i realized its already on the motor, and thats why it wasnt in the included list haha.i got the 48 white table for 110. it was delivered by fedex and they rang my doorbell and dropped it off at my door for me i was surprised since my entrance is kind of off to the side of my building and most people leave packages at the normal entrance and i have to go outside and around to get them. i also had injured my foot recently, so this was really convinient. isnt something amazon related, but compliments to the fedex worker and props to the company for using fedex to deliver their productsthe table top feels durable. i might cover it with a curtain just because im very particular about white things getting stained. overall, for 110, im pleased i will update my review once i get color beige style classic classic traditional contemporary casual modern purchase options and add ons brand pukami color beige product dimensions 20d x 25.2w x 34h size 20d x 25.2w x 34h back style solid back material polyester item weight 25.3 pounds frame material metal seat material type foam about this item stylish desk chair no wheels an elegant blend of comfort and style, the elimination of armrests and castors removes all unnecessary decoration, effortlessly matching any dcor to create an impression of comfort and elegance, the unique black lacquered cross aluminium base with non slip natural rubber feet attached to each support leg to prevent scratching and slipping, perfect for offices, bedrooms, studies, living rooms, dressing tables, parlours and dorm rooms. wide soft seat this armless office chair has a widened seat so you can comfortably sit cross legged or curl up in the chair. the backrest and seat are padded with high resilience foam and covered with twill fabric upholstery for a soft, skin friendly, long sitting experience. in addition, the chair uses an sgs certified class 3 gas lift that can hold up to 350 lbs. the wider cushion and premium gas lift provide you with long lasting comfort. ergonomic comfortable the u shaped design gradually releases the pressure on the back and hips from the middle to the sides, providing strong support for the back. the backrest and cushion are designed to fit the curve of the human spine, helping to adjust your sitting posture, reduce fatigue and injury caused by prolonged sitting and improve your work efficiency. multi function pukami office chair with 5 adjustable height, 360 degree swivel angle and 108 130 tilt angle, whether for office or leisure, it provides you with the most comfortable height and angle. you can use the powerful lever to adjust the seat height or keep the backrest upright, and turn the knob under the seat to control the tilt tension. easy to assemble the vanity chair comes with all the hardware and necessary tools, as well as detailed instructions. assembling this office chair yourself in the office or at home is easy and takes only 15 minutes. see more product details customer and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the comfort, ease of assembly, and color of the chair. they mention its very onyx1176 3.0 out of 5 stars chair squeaks and pops and padding not very comfortable reviewed in the united states on june 22, 2024 color beige style traditional verified purchase there are many criss cross chairs for sale on amazon, with prices ranging from reasonable, 70 80 to unreasonable, 100 or more. when i bought this chair for around 89, it seemed like a good deal compared to similar chairs. however, i have two main issues with the pukami brand the padding is quite hard, and the chair squeaks and pops whenever i move. i dont mind firm memory foam padding, but this padding is just plain hard with little give, and the noise comes from where the seat attaches to the gas lift. another annoying issue is that the adjustable arm under the seat isnt secure. one time over the few days i sat in the chair, the arm slipped out of the locked position, causing the chair to lean back unexpectedly. this function should only activate when the arm is intentionally pulled out. this type of chair is very easy to assemble, and i dont think the issue is due to assembly, so im unsure if mine is defective or if this is a common problem with this brand. despite these issues, it was still much better than the smaller chairs i had been using, so i decided to keep it. however, i needed another chair for my work desk and ended up buying an identical looking criss cross chair from another amazon seller at a cheaper price. while these two chairs look alike, the difference is significant. the new chair has softer fabric, and doesnt squeak or pop when i move. with that said, i decided to give the pukami chair to a family member and purchased another chair from the other seller for my work desk. i am glad i tried the criss cross chairs they are great and, if you pick the right brand, very comfortable and roomy. i highly recommend this style of chair, just not this vendor. in my experience, if you are looking for a chair because your current one is no longer working for you, any criss cross chair is likely better than what you are currently sitting in. read more 28 people found this helpful helpful report see more reviews top reviews from other countries denise fortier 5.0 star 1 star 70 16 8 3 4 4 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers appreciate the ease of assembly, with an array of products across several categories, bush furniture gives you the opportunity to outfit your entire home with appealing and reliable furniture. sustainable materials not only do engineered wood products begin life as a recycled product, but more than 95 of a tree can be used for the production of particleboard, versus 63 for solid lumber. a proud legacy based in jamestown, n.y., bush furniture has been a leading manufacturer of ready to assemble furniture for over 60 years. next page is this product made from solid wood key west products are not solid wood. they are manufactured using engineered wood with a laminate finish. is assembly required key west products do not arrive pre assembled, but most items are designed for installation in 60 minutes or less. what bush furniture key west drawer cabinets wti we tried it next page upload your video product description product description a natural fit for homes that embrace coastal and farmhouse decor, the bush furniture key west 2 drawer lateral file cabinet is perfect for organizing paperwork in virtually any room. two file drawers open on smooth full extension ball bearing slides for an easy reach to legal and letter size documents. a unique x pattern accent on the drawer panels creates a relaxed style supported by a sturdy and attractive post leg design. this 30w x 20d x 30h lateral filing cabinet matches the height of any key west desk sold separately to create an extended work surface when placed side by side. choose from a variety of casual finish options to find the perfect look for your space. the key west collection offers a wide variety of farmhouse furniture that makes building a complete home office or living room ensemble a breeze. this 2 drawer filing cabinet is tested to meet ansisoho quality standards for safety and performance and is backed by the bush furniture 1 year manufacturers warranty. see the full collection for coordinating items available. from the 7 3 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 1 star 69 15 5 3 7 7 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the photos amazon customer 5 out of 5 stars while instructions for building it could be better, the product itself is really solid and nice i have been buying put together furniture for over 2 decades and have learned to exclusively buy sauder furniture because of the quality pieces, , and assembling instructions the best in the market, imho. they even provide video. unfortunately, the sauder collection ive been purchasing to add to my studio in the last 10 years harbor view in antique white became discontinued and i needed a lateral file cabinet, i had to hunt for something in the same design genre. this led me to the bush furniture line, and i fell in love with this linen white oak finish, which is pretty close to what i already own.upon arrival, i did the usual checking of parts all good there, laid out all the pieces, sorted all the nails, screws, etc. into little tupperware containers my usual, got my tools, and got to work. i was dismayed though, at the less than great assembling instructions. thank goodness ive done this many times and was able to figure out some of the steps on my own some might not be able to get it so easily if theyre not mechanically inclined or have simply not used this type of furniture you put together yourself.the main issue was the drawer slides metal mechanisms that hold the drawers in place not easy to follow at all. i had the entire thing put together except for the last steps of the slides on the drawers and realized i had to take them apart and re assemble something ive never had to do.as far as the quality, though, this thing is solid. i love the back of it being made from same material as the sides and top something that sauder could do better on some of their pieces. im very happy with the result and look.ive already begun using it and one of the features that i really love is that the bottom drawer has a catch on the slides that has a satisfying click when you close it, and seems to help keep the whole unit from coming forward on you. i dont plan to load it down very satisfied with my purchase just know that the building process is more laborious and tedious than it needs to be.one major thing to note, if this matters to you the hanging file folders are not side by side facing forward. that only works for one half of each drawer, the way this is designed see photos. that was disappointing. all the designers wouldve had to do is add about an inch to the width of this cabinet to accommodate forward facing file folders on both sides with two dividers in the middle again, see photos.final note i would recommend that bush furniture create a couple of short videos on how to assemble the trickier aspects like the metal slides, using the bolts, etc. assembling furniture isnt always easy for the more difficult steps and would greatly enhance the customer experience. thanks more hide thank you for your feedback close sorry, there was an error close sorry we couldnt load the review try again sort reviews by top reviews most recent top reviews top reviews from the united states there was a problem filtering reviews right now. please try again later. debra hart studio 5.0 out of 5 stars while instructions for building it could be better, the product itself is really solid and nice reviewed in the united states on september 29, 2024 color linen white oak pattern name file cabinet verified purchase i have been buying put together furniture for over 2 decades and have learned to exclusively buy sauder furniture because of the quality pieces, , and assembling instructions the best in the market, imho. they even provide video. unfortunately, the sauder collection ive been purchasing to add to my studio in the last 10 years harbor view in antique white became discontinued and i needed a lateral file cabinet, i had to hunt for something in the same design genre. this led me to the bush furniture line, and i fell in love with this linen white oak finish, which is pretty close to what i already own. upon arrival, i did the usual checking of parts all good there, laid out all the pieces, sorted all the nails, screws, etc. into little tupperware containers my usual, got my tools, and got to work. i was dismayed though, at the less than great assembling instructions. thank goodness ive done this many times and was able to figure out some of the steps on my own some might not be able to get it so easily if theyre not mechanically inclined or have simply not used this type of furniture you put together yourself. the main issue was the drawer slides metal mechanisms that hold the drawers in place not easy to follow at all. i had the entire thing put together except for the last steps of the slides on the drawers and realized i had to take them apart and re assemble something ive never had to do. as far as the quality, though, this thing is solid. i love the back of it being made from same material as the sides and top something that sauder could do better on some of their pieces. im very happy with the result and look. ive already begun using it and one of the features that i really love is that the bottom drawer has a catch on the slides that has a satisfying click when you close it, and seems to help keep the whole unit from coming forward on you. i dont plan to load it down very satisfied with my purchase just know that the building process is more laborious and tedious than it needs to be. one major thing to note, if this matters to you the hanging file folders are not side by side facing forward. that only works for one half of each drawer, the way this is designed see photos. that was disappointing. all the designers wouldve had to do is add about an inch to the width of this cabinet to accommodate forward facing file folders on both sides with two dividers in the middle again, see photos. final note i would recommend that bush furniture create a couple of short videos on how to assemble the trickier aspects like the metal slides, using the bolts, etc. assembling furniture isnt always easy for the more difficult steps and would greatly enhance the customer experience. thanks read more debra hart studio 5.0 out of 5 stars while instructions for building it could be better, the product itself is really solid and nice reviewed in the united states on september 29, 2024 i have been buying put together furniture for over 2 decades and have learned to exclusively buy sauder furniture because of the quality pieces, , and assembling instructions the best in the market, imho. they even provide video. unfortunately, the sauder collection ive been purchasing to add to my studio in the last 10 years harbor view in antique white became discontinued and i needed a lateral file cabinet, i had to hunt for something in the same design genre. this led me to the bush furniture line, and i fell in love with this linen white oak finish, which is pretty close to what i already own. upon arrival, i did the usual checking of parts all good there, laid out all the pieces, sorted all the nails, screws, etc. into little tupperware containers my usual, got my tools, and got to work. i was dismayed though, at the less than great assembling instructions. thank goodness ive done this many times and was able to figure out some of the steps on my own some might not be able to get it so easily if theyre not mechanically inclined or have simply not used this type of furniture you put together yourself. the main issue was the drawer slides metal mechanisms that hold the drawers in place not easy to follow at all. i had the entire thing put together except for the last steps of the slides on the drawers and realized i had to take them apart and re assemble something ive never had to do. as far as the quality, though, this thing is solid. i love the back of it being made from same material as the sides and top something that sauder could do better on some of their pieces. im very happy with the result and look. ive already begun using it and one of the features that i really love is that the bottom drawer has a catch on the slides that has a satisfying click when you close it, and seems to help keep the whole unit from coming forward on you. i dont plan to load it down very satisfied with my purchase just know that the building process is more laborious and tedious than it needs to be. one major thing to note, if this matters to you the hanging file folders are not side by side facing forward. that only works for one half of each drawer, the way this is designed see photos. that was disappointing. all the designers wouldve had to do is add about an inch to the width of this cabinet to accommodate forward facing file folders on both sides with two dividers in the middle again, see photos. final note i would recommend that bush furniture create a couple of short videos on how to assemble the trickier aspects like the metal slides, using the bolts, etc. assembling furniture isnt always easy for the more difficult steps and would greatly enhance the customer experience. thanks images in this review helpful report jimmy 5.0 out of 5 stars nice cabinet but takes time to assemble reviewed in the united states on december 31, 2023 color shiplap graypure white pattern name file cabinet verified purchase the directions are fair, there are a lot of parts. i bought two and 1st took 50 minutes to assemble but 2nd took 25. parts are labeled with long numbers why not a,b,c and illustrations could be clearer for drawer glide direction and a few other parts. once assembled the cabinets are solid and dont wobble at all. i didnt install the anti tip that prevents both drawers being opened at the same time because of the video with the clicking sound but no kids ever come in my office. drawers line up perfectly with some common sense adjustments if needed during assembly. read more 2 people found this helpful helpful report starry nights 4.0 out of 5 stars does not fit two rows of letter front to back and dark color, very black not bright red ish cherry reviewed in the united states on december 31, 2021 color bing cherry pattern name cabinet verified purchase the media could not be loaded. first of all, this is engineered wood, not solid wood. the bottom of the drawers and the back of the cabinet are particle board. for the price, it is pretty enough, and functional. however, you cannot fit two rows of letter size folders front to back you can have one front to back, with the others sideways see video. you can move the center rail to accommodate legal size going front to back, and letter sideways. the actual inside dimensions are 22.5 inches long, 12 inches wide and 9.25 inches deep inside. the drawer depth is less than the front panel depth. when i close the door, the mechanism that prevents both doors from being opened at the same time clicks, and if i stop pushing the cabinet in at that point, the door is flush with the sides, but sticks out at the top and bottom. you give it one more push and it is where it should be located. i tried showing this in the video, and two photos. the rails are plastic. one thing that concerns me is that the front door is attached to the drawer pieces with a plastic part see photo of inside drawer corner. my father says plastic can be strong. time will tell. the drawers do come with one stop for each drawer, to prevent them from coming all the way out. the drawers open easily, and the drawer sliders rails are all metal. they are greased, so i got some grease on me during assembly. had to wash my hands several times to prevent grease from getting on the cabinet while i put on the drawer sliders. one pleasant surprise is that the unit comes with one furniture anchor see photo with orange bag, that has one zip tie and a butterfly bolt. because it is engineered wood, one of the side front posts already is damaged. i have contacted the manufacturer for a replacement, which was sent quickly. i didnt use glue where the dowels are placed the instructions dont say to use glue therefore, i was able to take it apart again and replace the damaged front leg without having to remove the back but i did have to take out both drawers. you must be very careful not to damage the wood while assembling the cabinet. the assembly instructions were pretty clear, and they have about 3 online youtube videos to watch assembly of the cam and bolts. i am familiar with using this type of connections, so assembly was pretty straight forward. it lacks advice about keeping the slide rails straight, so i used a square not included, and there is a little room for error here. if you keep the rails square, the drawers are pretty level when done. i used a level not included to get the front drawers into alignment i only had to adjust the bottom drawer by about 18 or less inches on one side. you adjust by unscrewing the plastic part see photo, moving the front panel slightly, and tightening the screws again. as for the color, i am disappointed. there is a photo of the color of the cabinet, but its actually darker than the photo shows. it has a lot of black, and is very dark. its not the color i wanted. the color i wanted is a more red ish color. overall, its nice enough for the price, and i will use it. it leaves me wanting a real all solid wood cabinet, one that is a different color bright red cherry and one that is longer, so you can have 2 rows of files front to back. from advice i have seen, people recommend that you do not paint engineered wood, because it cant be sanded. read more
