practices made with materials from well managed forests, recycled materials, andor other controlled wood sources. as certified by the forest stewardship council the forest stewardship council the forest stewardship council fsc supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. choosing fsc certified products whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the indigenous peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. choosing fsc certified products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the worlds forests. for a better future, choose fsc. learn more about this certification part of climate pledge friendly 3k bought in material wood mounting type floor mount shelf type tiered shelf shape rectangular about this item modern bookshelf designthe book shelf combines modern design with vintage colors, and it presents a unique personality along with a warm atmosphere that can blend in with most home decor styles. the multifunctional partition design of the book case is perfect for displaying your books, cds, magazines, video games, manga, decorations, novels, speakers and more. save space decor roomyoobure bookshelves dimensions 44.48h15l7.87w. the corner bookcase has 6 storage areas, each storage area can hold 510 books. with its open design and small footprint, this narrow bookshelf is easy to move and organize, making it ideal for corners and small spaces and perfect for use in living rooms, offices and bedrooms. while saving space, this small bookshelf is also a work of art, suitable as a gift for family or friends. sturdy durablethe skinny bookshelf is made of high quality board material, which is not easy to break and has a tough and durable texture. and the tree geometric bookcase is designed with backboard reinforcement, which has strong load bearing capacity. for added safety and stability, we offer anti tip furniture straps that allow you to secure corner bookshelf to the wall, especially for families with children and pets. easy to assemble cleanthe product package includes easy to follow instructions, numbered parts, assembly tools and an installation video on the product page, allowing you to quickly and easily assemble this wood bookshelf. this tall bookshelf has a flat and waterproof surface that can be easily cleaned with a damp rag. we provide 1 year after sales service for this book shelf organizer. if you have any questions and suggestions about our large bookshelf during installation and use, please feel free to contact us, our team will always be there for you. customers usually keep this item this product has fewer returns than average compared to similar products. report an issue with this product or seller make it a bundle we found 5 bundles with this item yoobure tree bookshelf 6 shelf retro floor standing bookcase, tall been moving forward to the original intention when yoobure founded. we give priority to customers needs and well go on improving to better serve you all. thank you for supporting yoobure new from yoobure best sellers how did we get our start yoobure starts with the idea of offering comforts and utilities to our communities. since 2016, offers a range of functional home furnishings that are really affordable for families around the world. what makes our products unique we pour all sincerity to our products. we sell not only goods but reputation, and harvest full trust from customers all these years. why do we love what we do fate makes us get acquainted and trust makes fate endless. we always keep in mind to make people much happier here next page product description before storage after storage previous page next page previous page next page can this unique bookshelf hold cds and magazines the size of the bookshelf is marked in the picture of the product, you can check the size chart first, and then place suitable items according to the size of the bookshelf. how many books can the wooden book shelves hold the spine bookshelf has 6 storage sections and a bottom storage space, each section can hold 5 10 books. is there an installation tool provided what tools do i need to prepare the package includes easy to follow instructions, numbered parts and assembly tools, so you can quickly and easily assemble this tall bookcase. tips an electric drill is required to install the anti tip furniture straps. sustainability features this product has sustainability features recognized by trusted certifications. forestry practices made with materials from well managed forests, recycled materials, andor other controlled wood sources. as certified by the forest stewardship council the forest stewardship council the forest stewardship council fsc supports responsible forestry, which is a vital solution to combat climate change. choosing fsc certified products whether furniture, building materials, paper, rubber, or textiles helps protect forests, wildlife, clean water and supports the indigenous peoples, forest workers and communities who depend on them. choosing fsc certified products can also help to mitigate climate change by supporting responsible management of the worlds forests. for a better future, choose fsc. learn more about this certification part of star 1 star 2 star 75 13 4 3 5 3 5 star 4 star 3 star 2 star 1 star 1 star 75 13 4 3 5 5 how customer reviews and ratings work customer reviews, including product star ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon our customers, and bring a convenient and comfortable experience to everyone,quality and comfort are our top priorities. this sofa is such a functional and aesthetic furniture set for limited space. it is durable and well balanced with its solid construction. the linen fabric an understated simple yet touch. and the classic coloring and sleek design can perfectly blend with any style of home dcor. in small space it is also possible to have both a sofa and a bed. multifunction 4 in 1 couch be easily and quickly converted from a chair to a sofa, lounger or sleeper bed in just a few steps,the sleeper bed can accommodate your overnight guests. it can meet any of your needs. elegant ottoman the ottoman can go virtually anywhere ,makeup room,dresser room,next to the sofa, in the corner of the room or adjacent to the entertainment system. love seat sofa comfy couch loveseat sofa chair,perfect for movie night, home office, sitting area for working, reading area and playing games. compact single bed when someone who wants to stay overnight comes to your house, you can put on a mat and used as a temporary bed. when the guest is gone, you can put it away and use it as an ottoman. simple lounge the longue is seen as a useful item for the modern home. it can be used to complement a homes dcor such as living or reading rooms, or as a stylish boudoir chair for bedroom seating. no matter what room it is, whether it is a large room or a small room, this is your best choice armrest side storage bag the armrest side storage bag, you can put tv remotes, game controller,thermos cup,magazine and pens,save your space.make your sofa tidier. wood feet durable solid wood feet designed to prevent scratching floors and can hold up to 350 lbs. 2 throw pillow soft decide whether it is the right product for them. to calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on amazon. it also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness. learn more how customers reviews work on amazon customers say customers like the in this review reviews with images see all photos previous page next page all photos amazon customer 5 out of 5 stars light blue review crazy that this is only 170 so versatile and comfortable enough i was doing a living room update and wanted to keep things in budget. furniture is absolutely ridiculously priced these days, ahem joybird cough cough...i didnt need hand crafted artisinal pieces from finland or something... now, this is not a super beautiful piece... its not going to win any awards.but its cheap and versatile so it fit my needs and standards. i replaced the wheels with heavy duty casters that swivel so i could push the ottoman around with relative easy... the wheels that came with it for the pull out part are static wheels to pull the piece straight in and out... i dont use the pull out too often but i do appreciate that its there if someone comes to visit and we watch a film or tv show etc, i want them to be able to relax and pull the bed portion out if they want to. since i do use it as an ottoman, i did not install the back piece. i dont really mind the black portion but if you have kids the two metal slots for the backpiece can be sharp if bumped into.... so just a word of warning if you also do not want to use the backpiece.adding a back piece kinda defeats the purpose of an ottoman in my opinion... but to each their own. the fabric is funky but cool enough that it fits in my room. i have a the flutterby multi color rug by ruggable and the color of blue works perfectly without being too matchy matchy... it also looks great next to my tan leather couch and pink velvet loveseatchair...ive used it to read on and like the adjustable back... i could probably sleep on it if i really had to but i havent napped on it really. its cozy enough to lay on though. attached photos of the pull out portion along with the wheels i installed that were like 8 for 4.worth the upgrade for how i use the piece.for the price, what are you waiting for get itoh i also painted the wood legs gold... just cuz i like having gold accents in my living room. did the same for my pink velvet chair more hide thank you for your feedback close sorry, there was an error on the best products weve tested from 4 the shark cordless vacuum has powerful suction that you can use on carpets as well as hard floors. itll run for up to 50 minutes on a full charge in standard mode and its led lights shine bright to illuminate hidden dirt and debris you may have otherwise missed. once the dust cup is full, simply press a button to empty it into the trash. the self cleaning brushroll has flexible silicone fins rather than bristles. translation you wont have to worry about hair and pet fur getting tangled up and slowing down the device. the cordless stick vacuum also comes with a hepa filter to reduce dust and allergens as you clean. convert it into a handheld vacuum when you want to remove dirt from furniture and between couch cushions, or extend the wand to get into hard to reach spaces like tall window sills and ceiling fans. it also comes with an upholstery brush, dust brush, and crevice tool. plus, it only weighs about 7 pounds, making it a lightweight choice that you can tote from room to room. the 14 best pet hair vacuums of 2024, tested by dog and cat owners i have owned and loved two dyson cordless vacuums, but saw this on black friday sale when my dyson broke this shark is hands down far more superior, one shopper said thanks in part to its useful attachments and long battery life. they finished their review by writing dyson owners you wont regret switching to shark. it slurps up dog hair like crazy and doesnt get tangled in the brushroller, another customer added . it doesnt scatter any dirt like other brands. the suction power is so strong, nothing escapes it. if youve been meaning to upgrade to a stick vacuum that can handle pet fur and other debris, nows the time. pick up the shark iz363ht cordless vacuum while its on sale,
